Dhampir_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_D: What a strange weather phenomenon... The air feels thick with an unusual energy. It's... unnerving.$2
The green rain again. I should probably stay indoors today. There's something about it that sets my teeth on edge.$2
Umm! Looking for something? I hope you find it just make sure to clean yourself up afterwards please.$2
Ouch! Hey, could you please be more careful with that thing? That really stung.$4
I put on sunscreen during the ride here.$1#$b#It's SPF 300 so I should be good to go!$9
A cool drink and a beautiful view. Now this is my kind of beach experience.$1
The salty air and slight breeze is perfect. I couldn't be more relaxed.$1
I'm not much of a dancer, but it's okay if everyone's have fun.$1
So many people... and so much sun. This is going to be so fun!$1
That was a nice break. But I'll be glad to get back to the cool, quiet forests of the valley.$0
The waves are so powerful.$0#$b#What's that? The water doesn't bug me?$2#$b#Nope! It's an ocean, not running water.$9
Just trying to relax for a bit.$0#$b#I'm sure I'll get a sunburn, I just hope it isn't too bad.$0
Ah, this is the spot. A little pocket of shade just for me.
It's getting a bit hot here. Maybe I should find some shade soon.
My love, I nearly tripped over your stuff earlier today.$2#$b#Could we please keep our pathways clear? I'd hate to fall and break something.$2
Oh... I see. You're giving {0} gifts. That's... nice of you.$2
There's something in the house! Get behind me, I'll protect you!$8
My love, I have something for you.$4#$b#It tastes like a cool, starry night and fills me with thoughts of you.$4
I... understand. If this is what you truly want, I won't stand in your way. I wish you happiness.$2
I should have known better than to think someone could accept me. Please, just go.$7
You look familiar. Have we met? My name is {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}}.$0
A Ruby! It's gorgeous, it reminds me of a drop of fine wine. Thank you so much!$4
Void Essence! This has such a wonderfully calming energy. Thank you, this is one of my favorite things.$4
This hardwood is beautiful. The grain is perfect. I can already imagine all the wonderful things I could build with this.$4
This is magnificent! Thank you, it feels like a piece of the beautiful night.$4
This is a very thoughtful gift. Thank you so much!$1
Oh. A gift for me? Thank you.$0
I'm... not very fond of this, I'm sorry. But thank you for the thought.$2
Ugh! W-why would you give me this? Please take it away, I feel ill.$3
Wine for my birthday? You know me so well! This is the perfect gift. Thank you, I'll save this for a special night.$4
A birthday gift? And it's something I love! This means so much to me, thank you!$4
Thank you for remembering my birthday. This is a very thoughtful gift.$1
You remembered my birthday. Thank you for the gift.$1
Oh. For my birthday... Well, it's the thought that counts. Thank you.$2
On my birthday... of all days... you give me this? Are you trying to make me sick? Please go away.$5
For me? I... I'd love to. I was hoping you felt the same way. This makes me very happy.$4
The movies? I'd love to go. The theater is so dark and cozy, it's one of my favorite places.$1
Oh... that particular film seems a bit too bright and loud for my tastes. Perhaps a different one?$2
I've already been to the movies this week. It's a bit of an indulgence for me, so I try not to go too often.$0
I'm sorry, someone else has already invited me.$0
I don't think that's a good idea. Not with you.$2
No! Get that garlic away from me! I can't even stand the smell!$3
I don't want anything from you.$5
Oh... you're very forward. I'm sorry, but I barely know you.$2
I'm flattered, really, but I think we should get to know each other better as friends first.$0
But... we're already dating. Your company is bouquet enough for me.$4
My love, we're married. You don't need to give me a bouquet, you already gave me your heart.$1
I... I'm sorry, I can't accept this. It's too soon. I'm not ready for that kind of commitment yet.$2
I'm sorry but my answer is still no.$2#$b#Please don't take this the wrong way, but perhaps someone else might appreciate your company more than me.$2
Are you sure you're ready for this? Your home seems a bit small for two people right now.$2
I hope you did well. I'm always impressed by the quality people bring from their farms.$1
Congratulations! Your grange display was magnificent. Your hard work really paid off.$1
Your display was still very impressive. Don't be discouraged, there's always next year.$1
Dance with you? In the sun? ...For you, alright. I will.$4
Of course, my love. I would be honored to dance with you, no matter how bright it is.$4
That's very kind of you to ask, but... it's just too bright out here for me. I'm sorry.$2
I'm your secret gift-giver this year. I tried to pick out something I thought you'd enjoy. I hope you like it.$4
I'm glad you like it. Happy Feast of the Winter Star!$9
I spent all last night talking with Robin. She's been teaching me so much about structural integrity. It's fascinating stuff.
I like coming here in the evening. It's nice and dim, and the chatter is pleasant to listen to.
This is nice. It's good to relax after a long week of work. Cheers.
Another week, another set of projects.$0#$b#Who knew that I'd be getting so much experience so quick!$1
Ugh... I didn't get much sleep last night.$7#$b#I had a nightmare where everything I built was crooked.$7

Robin is taught me about different wood joints yesterday. It's like a puzzle, fitting all the pieces together perfectly.$1#$b#I hope I can master it soon. I want to be able to build things that last for centuries.$0
Robin's wood store seems to have gone down quite a bit. Do you think I should collect some more?$0#$b#The trees there are so old and sturdy though... It feels like a shame to cut them down.$6
The week is almost over. I've learned so much working with Robin.$1#$b#I'm looking forward to a quiet weekend. Maybe I'll do some reading.$0
The weekend is a good time for my own projects.$0#$b#I'm trying to carve a small wooden bat. It's... harder than it looks.$2#$b#My first attempt looked more like a lumpy log.$4

My mom called last night. She's always worrying about me.$1#$b#I love her so much but I do enjoy having a bit of free space to myself.$1#$b#Everyone needs to grow into their own person someday right!$1
Happy new year. I'm looking forward to helping Robin with new town projects this season.$1
The sun is getting stronger. I should probably buy a hat.$0
I feel like I'm finally getting the hang of things here. Robin is a very patient teacher.$1
Ugh, summer. My least favorite season. It's just so... bright. I'll be spending a lot of time outside too...$2
I'm planning to do some work in the mines today. It's always cool and dark down there.$1
You have a certain glow about you. Must be all the sunshine you get on the farm.$4
Ah, finally. The nights are getting longer and the air is getting cooler. This is my favorite time of year.$1
The colors this season are beautiful, aren't they? I love the deep reds and purples.$1
I feel so much more energetic now that summer is over. I feel like I can get twice as much work done.$1
Winter is so peaceful. The sun is weak and the nights are long. I love it.$0
It's a good day to work with wood. The cold keeps the timber from warping.$0
I've always been a bit of a night owl. I get my best work done after the sun goes down.$0
I'm starting to feel like I belong in this town. The people here are so kind.$1
Spending time with you is like a warm hearth on a cold winter's night. Thank you for being my friend.$4
Pelican town is so much bigger than my hometown. It makes me nervous and excited to be here!$1
It took all night, but I finally have everything unpacked.$1
My mom and dad called me the other day to see how I'm doing.$0#$b#I told them that it's hotter here than I'm used to but that the everyone here is super nice!$1

Don't tell {{MPP_EK_Sebastian_Name}}, but I want to laugh whenever I see {{MPP_EK_Sebastian_Lower02}}.$1#$b# It's like {{MPP_EK_Sebastian_Lower00}} wants to be a creature of the night, but instead {{MPP_EK_Sebastian_Lower00}} just comes off as cheesy.$1#$b#Does {{MPP_EK_Sebastian_Lower00}} even know what a creature of the night is really like?$1
{{MPP_EK_Maru_Name}} and I stayed up too late the other night. {{MPP_EK_Maru_Lower01}}'s so smart with electronics.$1#$b#{{MPP_EK_Maru_Upper01}} must get it from {{MPP_EK_Maru_Lower04}} dad.$1
Demetrius and I were the only ones home for dinner last night. It was much less awkard than I thought it would be!$1
I can't believe it's already been a year since I got here! Pelican Town feels just like home to me now!$1
Dhampir_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_R: Ah, a rainy day. I love when the clouds hide the sun. It's so much easier to focus, don't you think?$1
Dhampir_StringData.Data_Festivals_Spring: Everyone seems so excited for the egg hunt. It's nice to see the whole town together.$1#$b#I think I'll just watch from here, though. Good luck!$1
It's a little bright out, but I'm getting used to it. It's fun seeing the kids get so excited about finding eggs.$0#$b#Makes you happy doesn't it?$1
Happy Egg Festival, my love. Just being here with you is a better prize than any egg. But...$4#$b#if you win, I wouldn't say no to that straw hat.$1
Can you believe how nice the weather is today?$0#$b#It's perfect for dancing!$4
This is my favorite festival of the year. Do you like dancing too?$1
Seeing you in the sunshine makes it all worth it. May I have this dance? Every dance, actually?$4
Dhampir_StringData.Data_Festivals_Summer: Phew, the sun is pretty intense off the water. I'm going to stick to the shade.$2
I remembered to wear my sunscreen this year and the ocean breeze feels wonderful!$1#$b#Have you put anything in the soup? I'm curious to try it.$1
As long as I'm with you, I can handle a little sun. Just please tell me you didn't put any garlic in the soup as a joke. My stomach wouldn't appreciate it.$1
Wow... this is incredible. All those lights in the deep dark... It's so peaceful. This might be my favorite night of the year.$1
I look forward to this every year. It's a good reminder that there's beauty even in the deepest, darkest places.$1
Being with you, watching the jellies... it's magical.$4#$b#It feels like the rest of the world has just faded away.$4
Dhampir_StringData.Data_Festivals_Fall16: There's so much to see! I've been looking at the woodworking in the grange displays.$1#$b#Robin has taught me a lot about checking for quality. Some of this is really impressive!$1
I'm feeling a little more competitive this year. I've been eyeing that slingshot game. What do you think of my chances?$1
This is so much more fun with you. Want to try winning a prize for me?$1#$b#Your grange display looks amazing, by the way. You have my vote!$9
Dhampir_StringData.Data_Festivals_Fall27: This festival is great! It's so... atmospheric. I love the decorations. The maze looks like fun, not too scary at all.$1
Ah, Spirit's Eve. I feel right at home here. I even helped Robin carve some of the spookier-looking decorations this year.$1
This is our kind of holiday, isn't it? A beautiful, dark night... it's very romantic. Let's go get lost in the maze together.$1
Dhampir_StringData.Data_Festivals_Winter: The air is so crisp and clean. The ice sculptures are beautiful, like giant frozen gems.$1#$b#I'm not much of a fisher, though, especially not when the water is moving like that under the ice.$4
With this much snow around I have to be extra careful of the sun but I just couldn't miss seeing the competetion!$1
It might be cold, but my heart is so warm just being here next to you. Let's huddle close until the competition starts$4.
We didn't celebrate The Feast of the Winter Star in my home town. It's such a kind tradition.$1
Happy Winter Star! I love the feeling of warmth and community in the air tonight. It makes the whole valley feel like one big family.$1
I don't need a gift. Having you here with me, happy and safe, is the only thing I could ever wish for at the Winter Star. You're my home.$4
Dhampir_StringData.Data_EngagementDialog: Every day I spend with you feels like a dream. I'm so glad we're taking this next step together.$4
I've been thinking about what we should build for our future. With you by my side, I know it's going to be perfect.$4
Dhampir_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_M: Good morning, my love. I was thinking of adding some new trim to the kitchen cabinets today. What do you think?$0
It's going to be a scorcher today. If possible, I'm going stay inside and work on some blueprints.$0#$b#Please be sure to stay hydrated out there.$2
The air is perfect today. It reminds me of the night we first met. I'm so glad you're in my life.$4
This is my favorite time of year. Long, peaceful nights spent safe and warm with you. It's perfect.$4
Just getting a little fresh air before the sun gets too high. The morning light is much gentler.$1
I feel so energized on days like this. The sound of the rain is like music.$1
A perfect day to stay inside, get cozy, and maybe read a good book by the fire.$1
The farm must love this weather. It's nice to know everything is getting a good, long drink.$1
This weather makes me feel so safe and content here with you.$1
I already took care of the animals. No need for you to get soaked, my love.$1
I'm so lucky to share this home with you. Every little thing we've built together makes me so happy.$1
Sometimes I just stop and look around at our life here. I never thought I could have something like this.$4
I'm thinking of carving a little something for you. Is there anything you'd like?$1
This house is filled with so much love. It feels... bright, in a good way.$1
Just tidying up a bit. A well-maintained home is a happy home!$4
The world feels so quiet and peaceful on nights like this. Come, sit with me.$1
There's nothing better than being warm inside while a storm rages on. Especially with you.$4
I could listen to this sound all night. It's so calming.$1
Everything is washed clean. It feels like a fresh start.$1
Snuggling with you on a rainy night is my favorite thing in the world.$4
Good evening, my love. I hope you had a productive day despite the weather.$1
The moon is beautiful tonight. Have you seen it?$1
Another good day comes to a close. I'm glad I get to end it with you.$4
Being a carpenter is hard work, but building this life with you is the easiest thing in the world.$4
Is there anything you need before we turn in? A glass of water? A snack?$0
I feel most like myself in the quiet of the evening.$1
I was just thinking about you. I'm always thinking about you.$4
I took my time on the way back tonight. The trees have a completely different life at night, it's wonderful.$1
I went for a long walk in the forest today. The woods have a completely different life at night, it's wonderful.$1
Living with you has made me appreciate the daylight so much more. Thank you for bringing so much light into my life.$4
Even on the hottest, brightest days, coming home to you makes it all worth it.$4
The lengthening nights of autumn feel so comfortable. It's the perfect season for cuddling.$4
Thank you for making our home so warm and inviting. It's the perfect sanctuary from the cold.$4
I have to be careful, but a little time in the yard is nice. The fresh air feels good.$1
Just checking on the state of the fence. A little preventative maintenance goes a long way.40
I should probably head back inside soon before I get a sunburn.$2
The farm looks wonderful, honey. You do such an amazing job.$1
It's a bit bright out here for me, but the warmth is nice on my skin for a little while.$1
What a beautiful day to be outside with you.$4
I think the house could use a fresh coat of paint next season. What do you think?$1
This corner of the house is my little sanctuary. It's dark and quiet... helps me recharge.$4
I was just watching %kid1 play. They have so much energy! It's wonderful to see.$1
%kid1 asked me to teach them how to carve wood today. My heart melted.$1
Do you think %kid1 will be afraid when they're old enough to understand about me?$2#$b#I hope they'll be proud.$0
Being a parent is a new kind of challenge. But I wouldn't trade it for anything.$5
Shh, I'm just watching %kid1 play. They're so silly when they don't know I'm watching.$1
%kid2 was following %kid1 around all day. It's so sweet how much they look up to their big sibling.$1
It's a bit chaotic with two, isn't it? But our house is so full of love and laughter.$1
I'll handle bedtime for %kid1 if you can take %kid2. Teamwork makes the dream work!$0
I hope I'm a good parent to them. I want to give them the world.$1
I was telling %kid1 and %kid2 a story before bed last night. I think they both fell asleep halfway through.$1
Good morning, my love. I made you some coffee. I hope you have a wonderful day.$1
Seeing you always makes my day better. You're like my own personal moonbeam.$4
You work so hard for our family. I made you something to eat, you deserve a break.$1
I feel like the luckiest person in the world today. I love you so much.$4
I feel so safe and loved with you. I can truly be myself.$1
Is there anything I can help with today? I'd love to work on a project with you.$1
Every day I wake up next to you is a good day.$1
I was tidying up the cellar. I found a bottle of wine I've been saving for a special occasion... and I think tonight is a special occasion.$4
I love our quiet life together. It's everything I ever wanted.$4
You're home! I missed you.$4
Oh, hello honey. How was your day?$1
The house is quiet today.$0
I was thinking of heading to bed early tonight. I feel a bit tired.$2
Don't mind me, just lost in thought.$0
I should probably do some chores.$7
I wonder what Robin is working on today.$0
Hm.$0
The seasons change, but the valley stays the same. There's something comforting about that.$1
Did you need something?$1
Evening.$1
I'm not in the mood to talk right now.$2
Please, just... leave me be for a while. The world feels too sharp and bright today.$2
Did you have to be so loud?$5
I have a headache. The sun was really bad today.$2
I think I just need some time to myself in my room.$2
Don't worry about me. I'll be fine.$2
Is that... garlic on your breath? Please, go brush your teeth.$5
Every joint in my body aches today. It's just one of those days.$2
I'd really appreciate some quiet right now.$2
Dhampir_StringData.Data_ExtraDialogue.Su: Being here with you... it's more than I ever dreamed of.$4#$b#I spent so long hiding a part of myself, afraid that the world would push me away. But you never did. You saw all of me and still wanted to stand by my side.$4#$b#You didn't just give me a home, you *are* my home. I love you.$4
Dhampir_StringData.Strings_StringsFromMa: Pictures of different trees fill the pages with details on their lumber quality.
Books about carpentry line the shelves. Robin's name is on the majority of them.
There's a note inside the drawer addressed to {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}}'s dad. Better leave it alone.
You shouldn't peek in other people's drawers.
There are numerous books on carpentry covering the shelves but in the corner you see some new books.#Nightfall, Full Moon, and Equinox.
It's a beautiful hand done painting by {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}}'s mother. It shows the hills surrounding {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower04}} hometown.
*You read a few lines of the book laying open.*#...#...Who would name their daughter Rotisserie?
Leave a gift for the one you love!
No matter what path you choose, I'll always be with you.^^   - {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}}
Dhampir_StringData.Strings_StringsFromCS: I never thought I'd find someone who would accept all of me. Thank you for not being afraid. Now, let's go home, my love.$4

Yes! A thousand times, yes! I promise to build you the happiest home we could ever imagine. I'm so happy, I feel like I could float.#$b#$4It'll be fast, but I bet with Robin's help I can be ready in three days!$4
Dhampir_StringData.Strings_MovieReaction: Oh, this looks fantastic! I love films that explore the darker, more complex side of things. I have a good feeling about this.$4
Shh... this is brilliant. The atmosphere is so thick you could cut it with a knife.$1
What a masterpiece! That's going to stay with me for a long, long time. Thank you for bringing me, that was perfect.$4
This looks nice. I'm just happy to be spending time with you.$1
I enjoyed that. It was a nice way to spend an evening together.$1
Are you sure about this one? It seems a bit... loud and bright. Well, if you really want to see it.$2
My head is starting to hurt from all the noise and flashing lights.$2
Well, that was certainly something. A bit too chaotic for my taste, I'm afraid.$2
Dhampir_StringData.Strings_AnimationDesc: Hi @! Robin said that I could take the day off to come to the festival!$1#$b#The sun is a bit harsh right now, but as soon as I cool down I'm going to try and win that man's quiz!$1
Hello love! I'm glad you made it!$9#$b#{{MPP_EK_Emily_Name}} keeps trying to dress me up but I'm too scared to let {{MPP_EK_Emily_Lower03}}!$4
My home town didn't have anything like this! I can't even imagine how to build a shop on a boat. I'll have to ask Robin later!$1
The art here is beautiful.$4#$b#Do you think I should commision a picture of us together?$4
Dhampir_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_D: {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}} seems like a good {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower13}}. I hope {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower01}} and {{MPP_EK_Maru_Name}} get along well.
{{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}} and I had dinner together last night.$0#$b#That {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower13}} is really learning {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower04}} stuff!$1
I heard you are dating {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}}.$0#$b#Make sure to take good care of {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower03}}. I see {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower03}} as my own {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower23}} now.$0

Congratulations on the marriage!#$b#I know {{MPP_EK_Sebastian_Lower00}}'ll never admit this, but {{MPP_EK_Sebastian_Name}} is jealous. I think {{MPP_EK_Sebastian_Lower00}} liked {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower03}} too!
How's my goddaughter doing?$1#$b#I need to swing by and visit you both soon.
I seriously misjudged your character. My only concern now is for {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}}'s well-being. Please keep your distance.
Dhampir_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_L: I heard Robin got a new intern!$1#$b#Perhaps we should throw {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower03}} a party to welcome {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower03}} to the town!$1
Everyone really has taken a liking to {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}}.$0#$b#I hope {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower01}} sticks around after {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower01}} finishes {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower04}} internship$0
Married to a Dhampir huh?$0#$b#And in Pelican Town of all places! Who would have thought?$1
Dhampir_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_M: The new {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower13}} seems nice.$0#$b#I wonder if {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower01}}'s any good at math...$0

{{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}} and I stayed up way too late the other day and now I'm bushed.$0#$b#I don't know how {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower01}} has the energy to keep up with {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower04}} work after that.$1
You finally worked up the courage to ask {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}} out?$0#$b#Took you long enough!$1
Oh my gosh! You guys did it!$1#$b#Congratulations on getting married!$1
When you get home, will you tell {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}} that we need hang out again soon?$0
I saw {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}} the other day. {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Upper01}}'s trying to be strong, but I can tell you really hurt {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower03}}. I'm... very disappointed in you.
Dhampir_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_R: {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}} is going to be such a good carpenter one day. I can already feel it.$1
I overheard {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}} talking to {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower04}} mom and dad the other day.$0#$b#I hope {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower01}} told them how well {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower01}}'s doing!$1
I heard that you and {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}} are dating.$1#$b#Just don't keep {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower03}} up too late. {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Upper01}} still has lots of work to do!$1
You two were beautiful at the wedding. Remind me to bring your gift over later!$1
How's your {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower29}} holding up?$1#$b#I'm so glad {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower01}}'s still helping out around town. {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Upper01}}'s so talented as a carpenter.$1
You broke that sweet {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower13}}'s heart. {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Upper01}}'s part of our family, you know. I don't have much to say to you right now.
Dhampir_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_S: Great... another sibling to deal with.$2
Sometimes I see {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}} staring at me.$2#$b#I can't help but feel {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower01}}'s judging me for my style.$2
Oh, you're dating {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}}?$2#$b#I guess that's cool. Not that I care though.$2
Congratulations on your marriage.$3#$b#You better take good care of {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower03}}.$4
{{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}} says hi? Oh, tell {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower03}} I say hello back.$4
So you couldn't handle it, huh? Figures. {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Upper01}}'s better off without you.$2
Djinn_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_Dji: Whoa! What is happening?!$3#$b#The sky is... green! This is so weird and exciting!$10#$b#I need to take notes, this could be a huge tourist draw!$1
It's another Green Rain!$1#$b#Quick, run to the valley and get me some materials! Think of the unique, mossy products we could market!$10
Hey! What are you doing in that trash can?!$3#$b#If you're that hard up for cash, I've got plenty of work that needs doing.$5#$b#Honestly, have some self-respect.$8
OW!$3#$b#Did you just shoot something at me?!$5#$b#Watch where you're pointing that thing, butterfingers!$8
This place is incredible!$10#$b#The amenities, the coordinated staff uniforms, the sheer volume of customers! I'm taking SO many notes for the Oasis!$1
A drink in the sun? Yes please!$1#$b#This is the life! I feel a new sales strategy bubbling up!$10
Don't mind me, just soaking up the sun and doing some market research.$1#$b#Ahh, perfection.$1
Woo! I love this music!$10#$b#It really gets the blood pumping!$1
I've arrived!$10#$b#Time to see what all the fuss is about. I bet our desert hospitality is warmer, though.$1
Aww, time to go already?$2#$b#I got so many good ideas today! I feel energized and ready for business!$1
The ocean is huge!$3#$b#It's a little intimidating compared to a nice, predictable oasis, but the sound is nice.$6
Gotta make sure I don't get sand everywhere.$0#$b#It's a professional hazard.$1
This shade is nice, but I live in a desert, I can take the heat!$1#$b#The sun gives me energy!$10
So much to see, so many business practices to analyze!$10#$b#This is better than any seminar!$1
My ember, I nearly tripped on this on my way to the kitchen!$3#$b#Let's clear a path, okay? Safety first, profits second!$0
Oh, for them?$6#$b#That's... nice of you to think of them.$7#$b#I'm sure they'll appreciate it.$8
A monster! In our house!$3#$b#My sandsong, get behind me! I'll... uh... distract it with a dazzling sales pitch!$5
My glow... is this for me?$2#$b#It tastes like a thousand desert sunrises combined into one.$1#$b#Thank you... for everything you are.$4
A... wilted bouquet?$3#$b#What does this mean? Are you... breaking up with me?$2#$b#I... I think I need to be alone right now.$7
Oh. It's you.$8#$b#I'm extremely busy with inventory today, so if you'll excuse me.$6
Hey there! You look like you've got some pep in your step!$10#$b#I'm Djinn! I've got big plans for this valley, you just wait and see!$1
Spicy Eel! Yes!$10#$b#The perfect fuel for a long day of making sales! You're the best!$4
A Fire Quartz!$10#$b#It's like holding a tiny, personal sun. It's beautiful, thank you!$1
Magic Rock Candy?! Are you serious?!$3#$b#This is amazing! Thank you so much, this is the best!$10
WOW! This is absolutely fantastic!$10#$b#You really know the way to a {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Lower13}}'s heart! Thank you!$4
Ooh, for me? This is great!$1#$b#I really like it, thank you for thinking of me.$4
Oh, thanks.$0#$b#I can find a use for this, I'm sure.$6
Um... thanks?$6#$b#I'm not really a fan of this kind of thing, but... it's the thought that counts, I guess.$7
Ugh, what IS this?$5#$b#Get it away from me! Do I look like someone who wants... this?!$8
For my birthday?! And it's my favorite!$3#$b#This is the best birthday I've ever had! Thank you, thank you, thank you!$1
A birthday gift! You remembered!$4#$b#This is so thoughtful, thank you so much, @. It really means a lot.$1
Oh, a gift for my birthday.$0#$b#Thanks for remembering.$6
It's my birthday... and you got me this?$7#$b#Oh. Well... thanks, I guess.$2
Are you kidding me?!$5#$b#On my BIRTHDAY of all days?! Just... go.$8
For... me?$4#$b#After everything you've helped me with... I... Yes! Of course, yes!$1#$b#I was really hoping you felt the same way!$10
A movie?! Heck yeah, I'm in!$10#$b#I could use a break from staring at sales figures. Just tell me when and where!$1
A horror movie? No way!$5#$b#I deal with enough stress at work, I don't need to be scared for fun!$8
Whoa there, eager beaver!$1#$b#I already saw a movie this week. My brain needs time to process all that cinematic data!$0
Aw, sorry!$2#$b#Someone else already invited me. Maybe next time!$0
Going to the movies with you?$8#$b#I think I'd rather count grains of sand. Individually.$5
Is this a joke?$5#$b#Don't give me your trash. I'm not a garbage can.$8
I don't want anything from you.$8
Whoa there!$3#$b#I like your enthusiasm, but I think we should get to know each other better first. Let's not rush things!$0
You must be joking.$5#$b#After everything that happened? The answer is no. Now, please leave.$8
Oh! @, I... I'm flattered, I really am.$4#$b#But... I'm not ready for that yet.#$b#$7There's still so much going on. I'm sorry.$7
I'd love to, but... where would I live?$3#$b#Your place is a little small for two... let alone for someone with as much energy as me!$0
You have the audacity to offer me that?$5#$b#After what you did?$8#$b#Get out of my sight.$8
Ooh, the judging! This is the most exciting part!$10#$b#Let's see whose display has the best market appeal!$1
You won first place! YES!$10#$b#I knew you could do it! Your grange display was a masterpiece of presentation and product selection!$1
Aw, tough break.$2#$b#But hey, your display still had a lot of potential! We'll workshop some new strategies for next year!$0
Dance with me? I thought you'd never ask!$10#$b#Let's go show everyone how it's done!$10
Oh! Uh, sorry.$2#$b#I tend to get a bit wild when I dance, so come back when you've practiced more!$2
Happy Winter Star, my ember!$4#$b#I was so excited to give you this. I really hope you love it!$1
Happy Winter Star!$1#$b#I saw this and immediately thought of you. I hope you like it!$4
I'm so glad you like it!$1#$b#Seeing you this happy is the only gift I'll ever need.$4
You like it! Great!$10#$b#I have a knack for picking out the perfect thing, don't I?$1
Welcome to the Calico Desert's number one tourist destination!$10#$b#How can I help you today? Looking for seeds? Artifacts? Unbeatable deals?$1
Pierre's has a decent setup, but I see so much wasted potential.$6#$b#He could easily triple his profits with a few of my marketing strategies.$0

Monday! Let's get this week started! I've got a whole list of inventory to sort and displays to build!$1#$b#I'm going to work SO hard, Pierre won't even know what hit him! Gotta prove I can pull my own weight, you know?$1
I had the worst nightmare!$7#$b#I dreamed that I just snapped my fingers to organize the whole stockroom, and everyone saw! They all thought I was cheating at my job! It was awful!$7

Pierre was teaching me all about supply and demand yesterday! It's like this giant, crazy puzzle that makes the whole world go 'round!$1#$b#If I can just master this, I can make this the most successful shop in the whole Ferngill Republic! Just you watch!$1

Our seed stock is looking a little low for the season! Do you think I should put up a huge, flashy sign?$2#$b#Or maybe I could come up with a jingle! 'Get your parsnips here, they're full of cheer!' ...Needs work, but it's a start!$10

Phew! What a week! I feel like I restocked this entire store by myself! It was a blast!$3#$b#Now that it's the weekend, it's time to have some real fun! Maybe I'll see if Gus needs a hand at the Saloon! The bigger the crowd, the better!$1

The weekend is my time to work on my grand business plan!$1#$b#I'm designing my very own dream store. It's going to have a roller-skating rink and a fire pole!$1#$b#Okay, maybe not the skating rink... but a girl can dream!$1
Sundays are the perfect days to get ready for the week!$1#$b#What about a day off?$3#$b#Maybe someday but not today! I've got WAY too much energy to waste it!$1
Monday! A fresh start to the week!$10#$b#So many opportunities for success! What's your big plan for the day?$1
Happy Summer!$10#$b#The heat is on, which means it's peak tourist season! I'm absolutely buzzing with energy!$1
The air is getting so crisp!$1#$b#I'm thinking of a new marketing angle... 'Cozy Autumn Deals at the Oasis!' What do you think?$0
Brrr! It's colder than a frozen tear out here!$3#$b#Good thing business inside is always hot, hot, hot!$1
Hey, @!$1#$b#It's good to see a friendly face. I've been staring at shipping manifests all morning.$5
It's Friday!$10#$b#You know what that means? Time to project our weekend sales figures!$1#$b#It's great seeing you, @.$4
I hope I didn't overwhelm Sandy too much yesterday... she had this exhausted look on her face!$0#$b#But this is going to be GREAT! I can just feel it!$1
First day as the official Operations Manager!$1#$b#I've got a whole list of ideas to run by Sandy. The energy in that shop is just waiting to be tapped!$1
I ran into {{MPP_EK_Emily_Name}} in town today. {{MPP_EK_Emily_Upper01}} still says my 'aura' is bright.$6#$b#It's nice to feel so welcomed, even if I came in like a sandstorm!$1
It's funny, looking back. I was so full of nervous energy that day.$6#$b#I just wanted to make a good impression. I think... I think it's working.$1
A whole month already! I remember telling everyone about the 'Regional Management Hub'.$10#$b#It felt like such a huge, impossible title then. Now it just feels... right.$1
Remember that party at Sandy's? When I barged in shouting?$1#$b#I'm glad you were there. It made me feel a little less like a complete stranger.$4
A year since I became Sandy's 'partner'.$6#$b#It all started with that little celebration. Feels like a lifetime ago, in the best way possible.$1
I... I'm still shaking.$2#$b#I really thought... when he started talking about you, @, I just... lost it.$5#$b#But we won. *You* helped us win.$4#$b#Thank you, my sandsong. For everything.$4

I saw Caroline at the shop today and she gave me a hug.$6#$b#It meant a lot. After everything Arnold said... trying to make my work feel like nothing... it's good to be reminded that people see the real me.$1

You know, for the longest time, I was terrified of someone finding out what I am.$7#$b#That courtroom... it was my worst nightmare come true.$2#$b#But we faced it. And we won.$1#$b#I'm not afraid anymore.$1
A year since that ridiculous trial.$0#$b#To think Arnold believed he could tear us apart by twisting the truth.$6#$b#He didn't understand. My magic isn't what makes me strong. You are.$4
Djinn_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_Rai: Another rainy day huh?$2#$b#Looks like a perfect day for indoor productivity!$1
Djinn_StringData.Data_Festivals_Spring13: Don't tell anyone, but I added a few eggs to the egg hunt!$1
I heard Abigail wins a lot. Maybe I should lay a trap for her!$1#$b#I wonder if anyone would notice?$1
Okay, my love, competition time! Winner gets the straw hat... and the loser has to do the dishes for a week!$1#$b$Huh? I can't participate?$3#$b#Oh alright. Just make sure win for me!$1
Djinn_StringData.Data_Festivals_Spring24: A dance?! With flowers?! And music?! This is the best day ever! I could dance for hours!$1
I've been practicing the steps all year! I want to be the star of the dance floor!$1#$b#You think anyone will want to dance with me? I hope so!$1
There you are! C'mon, let's get out there and show them how it's done!$1#$b#I want everyone to see how lucky I am to have the best dance partner in the entire world!$1
Djinn_StringData.Data_Festivals_Summer11: A party on the beach! WOO! The sun is a little bright, but the vibe is perfect!$1#$b#I brought a spiced starfruit stew for the potluck! I worked on the recipe for ages, I really hope the Governor likes it!$1

This party gets better every year! I'm trying to convince Mayor Lewis to add fireworks next year. Can you imagine?!$1#$b#Did you bring something for the soup? I'm so excited to taste what everyone made!$1
My ember, you're hotter than the summer sun!$1#$b#I made sure my soup contribution was extra special this year, just to impress you. It's my secret family recipe... Don't tell anyone!$1
Djinn_StringData.Data_Festivals_Summer28: I can't wait to see them all again! It's like a thousand magical lanterns floating in the dark!$1#$b#It makes you feel so small, but in a good way! Like you're part of something huge and sparkly!$1
I look forward to this all year! It's so quiet... but it's an exciting kind of quiet, you know?$1#$b#It's a good reminder that you don't always have to be loud to be spectacular.$1
This is so romantic! Just you, me, and a bazillion glowing sea-friends.$1#$b#Being here with you feels more magical than any wish I could ever grant.$1
Djinn_StringData.Data_Festivals_Fall16.D: The Fair! Yes! So many games to play, so many prizes to win! I'm going for the high score on the slingshot!$1
I was going to submit a grange display this year but I just ran out of time.$2#$b#I really wanted people to see how much work I put into it...$2

Alright, my champion! Let's win enough Star Tokens to buy out the entire prize shop!$1#$b#Your grange display is the best one here, hands down. You're a winner in my eyes no matter what the Mayor says!$1
Djinn_StringData.Data_Festivals_Fall27.D: Spirit's Eve! Heck yeah! Spooky music, a giant maze, and everyone's in costume! This is my kind of party!$1#$b#The maze isn't even scary, it's just super fun! I bet I finished it the fastest!$1
I gave Marlon some tips on how to make the maze even more exciting. More twists! More dead ends! More confetti cannons!$1#$b#He... didn't use the confetti cannon idea. His loss!$1
A dark, spooky night, just for us! How romantic!$1#$b#Let's race to the center of the maze. The winner gets bragging rights and unlimited snuggles!$1
Brrr! It's freezing! I'm from the desert, I'm not built for this!$2#$b#But the ice sculptures are SO pretty! And the energy from the competition is enough to keep me warm... for now!$1

I'm wearing three coats and I can still feel the chill! But I wouldn't miss this for anything! The excitement is too good!$1#$b#I really respect how hard these anglers work. Fishing in the cold is a serious skill!$1
Hold me! I think my sparkles are going to freeze and fall off!$2#$b#Only your love is keeping me from turning into a Djinn-cicle! Let's stay close.$1
Djinn_StringData.Data_Festivals_Winter25: A secret gift exchange! What a fun idea! Everyone is so nice and cozy.$1#$b#I hope my secret friend likes what I got them! I spent a long time picking it out!$1
Happy Winter Star! I love this tradition. It's so full of warmth and genuine kindness.$1#$b#It really feels like everyone in the valley is one big, loud, happy family!$1
Being here with you is the only gift I'll ever need. Cheesy, I know, but it's true!$1#$b#You took a loud, chaotic Djinn and gave her a quiet, wonderful home. That's the best gift in the universe.$1
Djinn_StringData.Data_EngagementDialogue: I still can't believe we're engaged!$4#$b#I've been running some... uh... sales projections for the wedding.$1#$b#It's going to be the event of the century!$10
Every time I look down at my hand, I just get this big, goofy grin on my face.$1#$b#I can't wait to marry you, @.$4
Djinn_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_Mar: This farm is really thriving, my glow.$1#$b#All your hard work is paying off. It's really inspiring to watch.$1
Tonight's the Dance of the Moonlight Jellies!$10#$b#I can't wait to watch them with you. It's so much more magical than watching them alone.$4
Happy first day of Fall, my sandsong!$1#$b#How about some spicy eel to celebrate the new season? My treat!$4
It's so cold outside, but it's so warm in here with you.$1#$b#I'm glad this is our home.$4
Just taking a little break and getting some sun.$1#$b#It's nice to have a quiet moment with you, my ember.$4
The sound of the rain is nice... but I'm glad I'm in here with you.$4#$b#It's a perfect day to stay in and... reorganize the pantry by expiration date!$1
I've already finished all my chores for the day.$1#$b#That means more time to spend with my favorite farmer.$4
Mmm, I love the smell of rain on the soil.$1#$b#It's so different from the desert. It smells like life.$1
This weather makes me want to just curl up with a good book.$6#$b#...A good book on advanced sales tactics, of course!$1
I left a little something for you in the kitchen, my ember.$1#$b#Think of it as a thank you for being so wonderful.$4
Being a homebody with you is my new favorite hobby.$1#$b#Don't tell Sandy, she'll think I've gone soft!$1
Just looking around at this amazing life we've built.$1#$b#All my worries about fitting in... they just seem to melt away when I'm with you.$4
I was thinking we could expand the farm next season.$1#$b#I've already drafted a five-step plan to maximize profits and cuteness! It involves more ducks.$10
Sometimes I just stop and watch you work.$6#$b#You're so dedicated. It makes me want to work even harder, too!$1
Our home is my favorite place in the whole world.$1#$b#Because you're here, my sandsong.$4
The storm sounds intense tonight.$3#$b#Good thing we're safe and warm in here together.$1
Let the rain wash away all the worries of the day.$6#$b#Tomorrow is a new beginning, my glow.$0
I feel like I could take on the world, as long as I have you to come home to.$1
Want to share some spicy eel and watch the lightning? It's kind of romantic, don't you think?$4
This kind of night makes me want to tell you all my secrets.$6#$b#But you already know them all, don't you?$4
I used to be scared of storms when I was little.$7#$b#But I'm not scared of anything when I'm with you.$1
The farm is so peaceful at night.$6#$b#I used to think I needed constant noise and excitement... but being here with you is all I need.$1
Have you eaten dinner, my ember?$0#$b#I can whip something up! My pepper poppers are almost famous in the Calico Desert!$1
Another successful day down.$1#$b#Time to rest up and get ready to do it all again tomorrow!$0
Come sit with me for a while.$4#$b#The chores can wait. I just want to be with my ${husband^wife}$.$1
I love you, my glow.$1#$b#Just wanted to make sure you knew that.$4
I'm so proud of everything you've accomplished.$1#$b#You've turned this place into something truly special.$1
Wish me luck! Things are going to be busy at the oasis today!$0#$b$I'll be back later tonight my sandsong!$4
I'm back!$10#$b#Things just haven't calmed down since the big sale.$1#$b#I'm just glad that corporate understands that you're my priority now!$4
The flowers blooming on the farm are so beautiful.$1#$b#It gives me an idea for a new potpourri to sell at the shop! What do you think, a 'Pelican Town Spring' scent?$10
Whew, it's a hot one!$1#$b#Reminds me of home. Let's make sure we both stay hydrated today, my ember.$4
My favorite part of fall is the colors.$1#$b#It's like the whole world is a warm fire. Just like my love for you!$4#$b#...Was that cheesy? It felt cheesy.$1
It's cold, but our home is so warm and full of love.$1#$b#I wouldn't trade it for all the gold in the desert.$4
The farm air is so fresh!$10#$b#Makes me want to run a few laps! It's all about productivity and personal health!$1
Ah, feels good to be outside.$1#$b#A change of scenery is always good for business... and for the soul!$1
All this green is still a bit of a shock compared to the endless sand, but I'm getting used to it.$1#$b#It's beautiful.$1
Checking on the animals.$0#$b#They're our most valuable, non-crop assets! And they're cute, too.$1
This open space is amazing.$10#$b#You can really think out here. No wonder you get so much done!$1
Looking at all the crops you've planted... it's amazing.$1#$b#Your hard work is written all over this land.$1
Just enjoying the sun!$10#$b#It feels almost as good as the desert sun.$1
This is my little corner of the world.$1#$b#I've got my sales charts, my marketing plans... and a picture of you, of course.$4#$b#It helps me stay focused on what's really important.$1
Whew! Keeping up with %kid1 is a full-time job!$3#$b#So much energy! I think they get it from me.$10
I was telling %kid1 a story about the desert last night.$1#$b#Their eyes were so wide! Maybe they'll be a little adventurer.$10
Do you think we're doing a good job?$7#$b#This whole parenting thing is harder than negotiating with a shipping company.$2#$b#But... it's much more rewarding.$1
I caught %kid1 trying to 'sell' their toys to the cat.$1#$b#A future business prodigy, I'm telling you!$10
Our little family is the best venture I've ever been a part of.$1#$b#Thank you for building it with me, my glow.$4
%kid1 was helping %kid2 'organize' the toy chest today.$1#$b#It looked like a cyclone hit it, but they were having so much fun!$1
It's amazing how different %kid1 and %kid2 are.$0#$b#It's like managing two very different, very cute employees.$1
Our house is so full of noise and laughter now.$10#$b#I love it. I wouldn't have it any other way.$1
I took the kids to see Sandy today.$1#$b#She absolutely adores them. She kept calling them her little 'Sand Sprites'.$10
I promise I'll always work my hardest to provide for this family, my sandsong.$1#$b#You and the kids are my world.$4

I woke up with so much energy today!$10#$b#I've already watered the crops, fed the animals, and drafted a three-point plan to increase our farm's quarterly earnings!$1#$b#You're the best partner a Djinn could ask for, my ember!$4
I made you a Triple Shot Espresso!$1#$b#Go get 'em today, my glow! Seize the day and all that!$10
I feel like I'm glowing today!$10#$b#Must be your love. It's better than any cup of coffee!$4
I feel invincible today!$1#$b#Let's go out and make this the best, most profitable day ever!$10
I reorganized all the chests this morning.$1#$b#Now our workflow will be 15% more efficient! It's the little things that make a big difference!$10
Everything is just... perfect.$1#$b#Our farm, our family... you. I couldn't be happier.$4
What a beautiful day!$10#$b#Makes me want to run a special promotion! 'Buy one hug, get one kiss free!' Limited time offer for my favorite customer.$4
I have so many amazing ideas today!$1#$b#Our farm is going to be the most successful operation this side of the Gem Sea!$10
Seeing you always puts a smile on my face.$4#$b#No matter what kind of day I'm having.$1
I love you so much!$10#$b#Just wanted to say it again! I'll probably say it again in five minutes!$4
Morning, my sandsong.$0#$b#Did you sleep well? I was up a little late looking over some seed catalogues.$6
Just another day on the farm.$0#$b#Got a lot to do today. Let's get to it.$6
Don't forget to eat breakfast, okay?$0#$b#You need energy to get through the day.$6
I'll handle some of the farm chores today, don't you worry.$0#$b#We're a team, after all.$1
I was just thinking about what to make for dinner.$0#$b#Do you have any preferences?$6
I wonder how Sandy and {{MPP_EK_Emily_Name}} are doing today.$0#$b#I should probably send them a letter soon.$6
The quiet life is... nice.$0#$b#It's very different from what I'm used to, but it's a good kind of different.$6
Just taking a moment to breathe.$0#$b#It's easy to get caught up in the hustle and bustle, even here.$6
Remember to take a break later, my glow.$0#$b#Overworking leads to diminishing returns.$0
Hm? Oh, sorry, I was a million miles away.$6#$b#Just crunching some numbers in my head.$0
Ugh.$8#$b#I had a nightmare that all our starfruit went bad right before we could ship it.$2#$b#It just... felt a little too real, you know?$7
I'm just feeling a little insecure today, my sandsong.$7#$b#Sometimes I still worry that I'm not pulling my weight around here... that you do everything.$2
I'm not feeling my usual peppy self today.$2#$b#Maybe I just need a hug.$7
I got a letter from my old boss.$6#$b#It wasn't mean or anything, but... it just brought back a lot of stressful memories.$7
I feel like a fraud sometimes.$7#$b#All this energy... sometimes it's just a mask. Thanks for always seeing the real me, my glow.$2
I feel so tired today.$7#$b#I don't really feel like talking, if that's okay.$2
Do you ever think about the desert?$7#$b#I miss the dry heat sometimes. The way the sand sparkles at sunset.$2
I had that awful court case on my mind when I woke up.$7#$b#I know it's over, but... it's hard to forget people hating you for what you are.$2
Sorry if I seem a little quiet.$7#$b#I just don't have the energy to be 'on' today.$2
Is it okay if I'm not bubbly and loud today?$7#$b#I still love you just as much. I'm just... feeling a little small.$2
Djinn_StringData.Data_ExtraDialogue.Summ: Looking out at the valley like this... it's amazing.$0#$b#For so long, I was scared of people finding out what I was. I thought they'd see my work as just... cheap magic.$7#$b#But you never did. You saw me. Just me.$2#$b#Being with you, my ember, gave me the confidence to be my true self. Thank you for giving me a home where I can truly shine.$4
Djinn_StringData.Strings_StringsFromMaps: Sorry, I'm out for the day. I'll be back later!^^-Sandy
{{MPP_EK_Djinn_Name}}'s fridge is crammed full of sodas.
It's {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Name}}'s laptop.#{{MPP_EK_Djinn_Upper04}} inbox is full of messages from Sandy.
Djinn_StringData.Strings_StringsFromCSFi: We did it! We're actually married!$10#$b#I promise to be the most exciting, supportive, and... passionate {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Lower29}} ever!$4#$b#My ember, our future together is going to be dazzling!$1

I... I don't even know what to say!$3#$b#Is this really happening?! YES! A thousand times, yes!$1#$b#I'm going to be the happiest Djinn in the entire world!$1#$b#Just give me three days to get everything ready!!$4
Ooh! I've been wanting to see this one! I have a feeling it's gonna be great!$10
YES! That was AWESOME! This is the best movie ever!$3
That was incredible! Action, laughs, everything!$10#$b#We should totally see it again sometime!$1
This looks like it could be fun. Let's get some snacks!$1
I liked that! It was a nice way to spend the evening.$0#$b#Thanks for inviting me, @.$4
Hmm. Are you sure about this one?$6#$b#Well, okay. I'll give it a shot.$0
Is it... over yet? I think I need a triple shot espresso to stay awake.$7
Well... that was certainly a movie.$6#$b#Let's... maybe see something with a little more pizzazz next time?$0
Djinn_StringData.Strings_AnimationDescri: YES! I managed to get the day off! This festival has the best energy! It reminds me of home!$1#$b#I hope I have enough time to check out all the shops!$1
There you are, my love! I was just about to cause a scene to get your attention!$1#$b#Let's go win you a prize from the Oasis shop. You deserve the best, after all!$1
A market on the water?! This is incredible! The logistics alone must be a nightmare!$1#$b#I bet I could design a more efficient layout for the docks. Just need to think about it...$1
The sky is beautiful tonight.$1#$b#Look a shooting star! Quick, make a wish!$8
Djinn_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_San: {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Name}}... {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Lower01}}'s a real whirlwind.$2#$b#I really wish someone had told me before hand.$2#$b#{{MPP_EK_Djinn_Upper04}} energy is... something else.$2

So, you and {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Name}}, huh? {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Upper01}}'s a lot to handle, but {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Lower04}} heart's in the right place.$1#$b#You be good to {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Lower03}}, alright? {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Upper01}} deserves to be happy$1.
I never thought I'd see {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Name}} settle down, but you two are perfect together.$1#$b#Business has never been better, and neither has {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Lower01}}. Congratulations, @.$1

You know, with {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Name}} around, the Oasis feels more alive than ever.$1#$b#It's not just a business partnership... it's like having family out here.$1#$b#Thanks for making {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Lower03}} so happy.$1

You divorced {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Name}}? After everything?$3#$b#I... I don't have anything to say to you. {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Upper01}} poured {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Lower04}} heart and soul into this valley... and into you. Just... go.$3
Djinn_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_Emi: Did you meet {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Name}} at the Oasis? {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Upper04}} aura is incredible! It's like a supernova of creative energy. The desert is going to love {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Lower03}}!

I saw {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Name}} in town!$1#$b#{{MPP_EK_Djinn_Upper04}} energy is just as bright as when I first met {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Lower03}}.$1#$b#I told {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Lower03}} it's a wonderful thing to shine like that.$1
You and {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Name}} are dating!$1#$b$I knew it! Your energies are so harmonious together. It's like seeing two complementary colors blend into a beautiful new shade.$1
Congratulations on your marriage!$1#$b$The threads of fate have woven you and {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Name}} into a beautiful tapestry.$1#$b$I can feel the positive vibrations from here!$1

It's so wonderful having {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Name}} as a part of our little community's family.$1#$b${{MPP_EK_Djinn_Upper04}} spirit has really helped the whole valley resonate with a higher frequency of joy.$1
Oh... I heard about you and {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Name}}. The energy between you feels so... fractured.$2#$b#I hope you can both find a way to heal your auras. It's very sad.$2
Djinn_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_Car: I hear there's a new manager out at the Oasis working with Sandy.$0#$b#Sounds like {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Lower01}} has... a lot of ambition. I hope {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Lower01}}'s a good fit for our quiet community.$0

I saw {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Name}} the other day. After that dreadful business in court... {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Lower01}} looked like {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Lower01}} needed a friend.$0#$b#{{MPP_EK_Djinn_Upper01}}'s a good person, no matter what that awful man said. I'm glad you were there for {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Lower03}}.$1

Oh, you're dating {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Name}}? {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Upper01}}'s such a bright young {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Lower09}}. A little intense, perhaps, but {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Lower04}} heart is golden.$1#$b#I'm happy for you both.$1
It's wonderful news that you and {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Name}} are married.$1#$b#{{MPP_EK_Djinn_Upper01}}'s brought so much positive change to the desert. You two make a lovely couple.$1
{{MPP_EK_Djinn_Name}} has become such a pillar of our community, hasn't {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Lower01}}?$1#$b#It's been a joy to watch {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Lower03}} find a true home here with you.$1
I'm so sorry to hear about you and {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Name}}.$2#$b#A divorce is always so difficult on everyone. I just hope {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Lower01}}'s doing alright.$2
Djinn_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_Lew: Ah, @! Congratulations on your marriage to {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Name}}.$1#$b#A union between our valley's finest farmer and the Calico Desert's star Operations Manager!$1#$b#It's a boon for regional relations, I must say! And... ah... for personal happiness, of course. Of course.$1
Kraken_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_Kr: This rain... it feels different.$3#$b#The air is heavy, and the plants are almost... glowing.$3#$b#It's unsettling.$3
Another green rain.$3#$b#It feels just as strange as the first time. I wonder what causes such an odd phenomenon on the surface world.$3
Digging through trash? Have you no pride?$5
Do that again and I'll drag you to the bottom of the ocean.$5
So this is the human idea of a 'resort'?$6#$b#It's... sandy. I suppose that's something.$6
They serve drinks made of... fruit?$1#$b#If you're buying, I'll try them all.$1
Hmph. I suppose I can rest my tentacles for a moment.$2
Don't even think about it.$5
An old friend of mine used to live here.$1#$b#I always forget how beautiful it is here$1
Are you heading back as well?$4#$b#If I stay any longer I'll start looking like fried calamari.$4
This shore is pathetic compared to the crushing depths I call home.$6#$b#Still... the water feels nice.$0
Why would I lie on a flimsy piece of cloth when the entire ocean is right there?$8
This shade is... acceptable. It keeps the worst of the sun off me.$0
I'm just observing the local fauna...The human kind.$6#$b#They're very strange creatures.$6
I can't get to the kitchen, @.$5#$b#I'll clean a path if I need to but don't bother asking where your trash goes.$5
Oh, giving gifts to someone else now, are we?$5#$b#Don't forget who you're married to, @.$5
There are monsters in the house.$8#$b#Stand back, @. I'll handle this.$8
My pearl... you've been working so hard.$4#$b#I found this in the depths. It reminded me of the light you brought into my life. Please, have it.$4
Is this a joke?$5#$b#You... you're breaking up with me?$2#$b#After everything... Fine.$8#$b#Get out of my sight. And don't ever speak to me again.$8
I knew I should never have trusted a human.$8
Do I know you?$3#$b#You have the scent of the sea about you, but... I don't recognize your face.$3
Lobster Bisque!$9#$b#This is sublime! Thank you!$9
An Octopus! A fine specimen of the deep.$9#$b#You have good taste for a land-dweller.$9
Crab cakes? I can't think of a better snack!$9
Where did you get this?! I can't thank you enough!$4
A treat like this reminds me of home. Thank you!$1
I'm not sure what you did to this but it smells vile.$5
Is this a joke? You offer me bait like a common fish!$5#$b#You disgust me.$5
This is... incredible!$4#$b#How did you know I liked this?$4
A worthy gift.$1#$b#You're not as clueless as you look.$1
Hmph. I suppose I can take this off your hands.$0
What is this?$5#$b#Take it back. I have no use for surface-dweller rubbish.$5
Is this an insult?!$5#$b#Get this foul thing away from me! Now!$5
A Pearl... for my birthday?$4#$b#It's as beautiful as the moon on the water.$9#$b#Thank you, @. This is the best gift I've ever received.$4
For my birthday? You actually remembered...$4#$b#This is... thank you. I'll treasure it.$9
A birthday gift? You shouldn't have.$1#$b#...But I'm glad you did. Thank you.$1
Oh. It's my birthday.$0#$b#I'd forgotten. Thanks, I guess.$1
You got me this... for my birthday?$5#$b#Your taste is as bad as your timing.$5
You dare bring me this filth on my own birthday?!$5#$b#This is the worst gift I've ever seen!$5
A bouquet...$0#$b#So this is how humans declare their intentions?$0#$b#You're a strange, brave creature, @.$4#$b#I accept.$4
The cinema?$0#$b#Hmph. A box where humans stare at flashing lights.$0#$b#...Fine. I'll go. But only because you asked.$0
Absolutely not.$5#$b#That movie sounds dreadful.$5
I've already subjected myself to the cinema once this week.$5#$b#That's my limit.$5
Someone else has already invited me.$0#$b#You're too slow.$0
You think I'd ever go anywhere with you again?$5#$b#Leave me alone.$8
Fried Calamari?!$5#$b#You took a magnificent creature of the deep and... and you fried it?!$5#$b#You're a monster! I will not accept this insult!$5
I want nothing from you.$8
What is this?$5#$b#Don't touch me.$5
Are you serious?$5#$b#I barely know you. I certainly don't 'date' you.$8
I've already accepted your strange human ritual.$0#$b#Are you that forgetful?$0
You seem confused.$1#$b#We're married. My answer is forever 'yes'.$4
The audacity.$5#$b#Get that away from me.$8
A Mermaid's Pendant?$5#$b#You understand what that means right?$5#$b#I cannot accept something like this from someone who doesn't respect the time it takes to make such an offer.$8
Marriage?$0#$b#Where would I even live? Your house is too small to accommodate me properly.$0
You want another wedding?$4#$b#If you wish we could always celebrate among my own kin next time?$4
You destroyed what this pendant means.$5#$b#Never show your face to me again.$8
Let's see what pathetic produce the valley has managed to grow this year.$1
You... won?$3#$b#I'm not surprised. Your determination is one of your... less annoying qualities.$4
No I won't comfort you on your loss. Try harder next time.$5
You didn't even display anything?$0#$b#How lazy can one human be?$8
You put the Mayor's underwear on display?$3#$b#...I have to admit, that's almost amusing.$1
Fine.$4#$b#I will participate in your ridiculous flower ritual.$4#$b#But only this once.$0#$b#And don't you dare step on me.$5
Of course I'll dance with you, my love.$9
Dance? With you?$5#$b#I'd rather wrestle a sea serpent.$8
Happy Winter Star, my treasure.$1#$b#I dove to the deepest trenches to find something worthy of you.$4
Here.$0#$b#Don't look so surprised. I heard it's tradition, so I participated.$0
I hope it serves you well.$4#$b#Spending this day with you is the only gift I truly need.$9
I trust it is... satisfactory?$0
The sun is too bright.$8#$b#I prefer the cool, dark comfort of the depths.$7
The tide is coming in.$6#$b#The ocean is calling me home.$7
So many humans...$8#$b#All scurrying about like ants. It's unsettling.$5
Another day on the surface world.$6#$b#What do you want?$0
You're still around?$0#$b#You humans are persistent creatures, I'll give you that.$6
Seeing you is... not the worst part of my day.$4#$b#Don't get used to such high praise.$5
Don't stare at my tentacles.$5
Willy says the fish are biting well today.$0#$b#Not that he could ever catch the truly interesting things that live in the deep.$0
Sometimes I miss the crushing pressure of the deep sea.$7#$b#But then I remember you're up here... and it's not so bad.$4
I saw you working on your farm earlier.$0#$b#It seems like a lot of effort for a few vegetables.$0
The air smells of... dirt and flowers.$0#$b#It's a strange smell. Not entirely unpleasant, I suppose.$0
The heat on the surface is oppressive.$8#$b#I'm staying in the water as much as possible.$8
The night market is soon.$6#$b#I've watched it from afar many times but I think I'll attend this year.$0
The leaves are dying.$6#$b#A fitting aesthetic for this world.$0
You think this cold is bothersome to me?$0#$b#The ocean is always cold in the depths.$0
Not many humans would take the time to help a kraken like me.$0#$b#I hope I don't live to regret it, but for now I will choose to trust you.$0
Thank you for coming with me tonight. If you see Jodi again make sure to tell her that dinner was delicious!$2
About what Jodi said the other night...$11#$b#I-I need some time to think.$2
A kraken and a human... is it possible?$11
Vincent came to the beach the other day.$0#$b#He had a lot of interesting questions about me.$0#$b#I'm sure his mother would have scolded him if she'd heard some of them.$0
Families like Jodi's.$7#$b#I wonder if I've ever...$2
I'm in the mood for some lobster bisque.$1#$b#What would you do if I asked you to have Jodi make me a batch.$1
Jodi told me she wants to do dinner again sometime.$0#$b#Oh, she hasn't invited you?$3#$b#Too bad. It looks like I'm the favorite now.$1
Kraken_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_Ra: Finally, some decent weather.$1#$b#The rain reminds me of home. Dark, wet, and quiet.$9
Kraken_StringData.Data_Festivals_Spring1: Humans hunting for eggs.$0#$b#It's a frivolous and inefficient way to gather food.$0
Such an interesting tradition...$0#$b#Do they eat the eggs after they've laid out in the sun?$0
Vincent told me he would give me an egg when he won.$9#$b#Don't you dare beat him.$5
Kraken_StringData.Data_Festivals_Spring2: All these flowers... and bright colors.$3#$b#It's a bit overwhelming.$3
Can I dance with so many legs?$5#$b#You seem to manage just fine with only two.$8
My pearl, let us dance like the oceans current today.$4
Kraken_StringData.Data_Festivals_Summer1: The Luau... a human potluck.$3#$b#I wonder what they've thrown into the soup. I hope it's not something I'd consider a friend.$7
My kind do something like this as well but ours is a bit more... well, more.$1
Willy told me he brought a fresh octapus.$4#$b#I'm sure this meal will be a delight!$9
Kraken_StringData.Data_Festivals_Summer2: Ah, the moonlight jellies.$4#$b#A silent pilgrimage from the great abyss. They remind me of home.$4#$b#It's beautiful.$4
Such amazing creatures, the moonlight jellies.$0#$b#Few things compare to the rush of going beyond your world's limits.$0
To journey away from what you call home is something I relate with.$4#$b#May they find their treasure like I found mine.$9
So this is the Stardew Valley Fair that Marlon mentioned.$0#$b#Let's see what you've brought to display.$0
I was going to win the fishing game but apparently it's against the rules to get in the water.$8
Willy has put on quite the show my treasure. Do you think you can beat him?$4
Humans celebrating ghosts and monsters they understand nothing of.$8#$b#If they knew what really lurked in the dark, they wouldn't be so cheerful.$5
Spirits and monsters.$0#$b#It's amusing that you humans think they are so different.$0
Me? Go to the maze with you?$3#$b#My pearl, I figured you'd want to go home before I pull at you from the dark.$1
Kraken_StringData.Data_Festivals_Winter8: Fishing in the ice?$0#$b#A decent challenge, I suppose. Though it's easier when you can just punch through it.$0
I swam beneath the ice before everyone got here.$0#$b#You're bound to find plenty of fish today.$0
You already caught my heart, so go catch us some dinner!$1
Kraken_StringData.Data_Festivals_Winter2: The Feast of the Winter Star.$0#$b#Another strange human tradition centered around gift-giving.$0#$b#...It's not so bad.$1
I never thought I'd look forward to something like this, but it seems to be growing on me.$9
Another year has come and gone.$4#$b#Thank you for choosing to spend it with me, my pearl.$9
Kraken_StringData.Data_EngagementDialogu: I can't believe I'm engaged to a human.$4#$b#...I also can't believe how happy I am about it.$9
Soon we'll be married.$1#$b#I'll protect you with my life, @. I swear it on the tides.$4
Kraken_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_Ma: Good morning, my tide.$1#$b#I was just thinking... this farm is our kingdom now. And you are its ruler.$4
The night market starts tonight.$0#$b#Perhaps we can find some treasures from the deep sea together.$1
The air is crisp.$6#$b#It's a good day to stay inside... with you.$4
I've patrolled the farm's perimeter.$1#$b#No monsters will dare approach our home while I'm here.$0
I'm just watching the sky.$6#$b#It's so vast. Almost as vast as the ocean... or my love for you.$4
Ah, a perfect day.$9#$b#Let's just stay inside together, @. The world outside can wait.$1
The sound of the rain is so soothing.$6#$b#It makes me feel at peace here with you.$9
Worried about the crops?$0#$b#Don't be. The rain is a gift to the land, just as you are a gift to me.$4
Do you ever wonder what creatures come out in the rain?$6#$b#Perhaps I could introduce you to some of them.$1
I love days like this.$9#$b#It feels like the world has washed itself clean.$1
I finished my chores for the morning.$1#$b#Now I can spend the rest of the day thinking about you.$4
Is there anything you need, my treasure?$1#$b#Just say the word and I'll fetch it from the deepest ocean trench.$4
This house is so... warm.$6#$b#It's nothing like my cold, dark home. It's... nice.$9
I organized your chests for you.$1#$b#Don't look so surprised. My tentacles are quite dexterous.$0
Living with a human is full of surprises.$6#$b#Good ones. Mostly.$4
The storm sounds fierce.$6#$b#But we're safe in here together. That's all that matters.$9
Come, sit with me.$1#$b#Let's listen to the rain and forget everything else.$4
A perfect night.$9#$b#It feels like the whole world is just you, me, and the storm.$1
I feel so powerful on nights like this.$6#$b#But my greatest strength is having you by my side.$4
The lightning flashes illuminate your face perfectly.$4
Good night, my pearl.$9
The stars are out tonight.$6#$b#They're pretty, I suppose. But they pale in comparison to you.$4
Are you tired from working all day?$2#$b#Come here. Let me help you relax.$1
Another day is done.$0#$b#I'm glad I get to end it with you.$9
I sometimes wonder what my people would think of me now.$7#$b#Married to a human... living on a farm.$6#$b#But then I look at you, and I know I made the right choice.$4
This quiet life... it suits me more than I ever thought possible.$9
Sleep well, @. I'll be watching over you.$1
I went for a swim down by the beach.$1#$b#I brought you back this shell. It's not a Rainbow Shell, but... it reminded me of you.$4
This season of renewal... it feels like how I feel about you.$4#$b#You made my whole world new again.$9
Don't overwork yourself in the heat, @.$2#$b#If you need to cool down, the ocean is always waiting.$1
Everything is changing color.$6#$b#It's a reminder that nothing is permanent... except my love for you.$4
The world is asleep under a blanket of white.$6#$b#It's quiet. Peaceful. Like our life together.$9
I'm checking for weaknesses in the farm's defenses.$6#$b#A warrior's work is never done, even in peacetime.$0
The air on land is so... thin.$6
This dirt is strange to walk on.$0#$b#I'm used to the soft sand of the seafloor.$6
I wonder what Jodi is up to today?$6
The sun is an oppressive tyrant.$8
Just stretching my tentacles.$1
This farm... it's our territory.$1#$b#I will defend it with everything I have.$5
This is my corner of our home.$1#$b#A small piece of the ocean in a sea of land. It's comforting.$1
I've been teaching %kid1 about the tides.$1#$b#It's important they understand the power of the sea.$1
Our child has your eyes.$1#$b#...And hopefully my strength.$1
%kid1 is sleeping soundly.$9#$b#I watch over them while they sleep. It is my duty as a parent.$1
Do you think that Vincent likes %kid1?$2#$b#I do hope they become friends.$2
Being a parent is harder than any battle I've ever fought.$2#$b#But I wouldn't trade it for anything.$9
%kid1 was showing %kid2 a crab I brought back from the ocean.$1#$b#They really are best friends to each other.$9
Our little school of fish is growing.$4#$b#I never imagined a life like this.$9
I will teach them both to be strong.$1#$b#They are the children of a kraken and a farmer; they will be formidable.$5
The house is so full of life now.$1#$b#It's chaotic, but... I love it.$9
I would tear apart the world for you and our children, @.$5#$b#Never doubt that.$5
My love! You look radiant today.$1#$b#Living on the surface truly agrees with you.$4
Good morning, @.$1#$b#I've already fed the animals and watered a few of your crops. The ones by the water.$0
I found this in a shipwreck this morning. For you.$4
You make me feel... human.$4#$b#And I mean that as the highest compliment I can give.$9
I love you more than the moon loves the tides.$9
Let's go for a walk on the beach tonight, just the two of us.$4
Every day with you is a treasure found in the deepest abyss.$9
This morning, I repaired some of the fences.$1#$b#It's the least I can do to protect our home.$4
Seeing you smile is brighter than any pearl.$4
I feel so... happy.$4#$b#It's a strange and wonderful feeling.$9
Morning.$0
Don't work too hard today.$0
The tides are low this morning.$6
Have you seen Willy recently?$0
The house is quiet today.$6
Hmm.$0
Is there something you need?$0
Dinner will be... fish. As usual.$0
Oh, it's you.$0
Me? I was just thinking.$0
Leave me alone.$8
Don't talk to me right now.$8
I need some time to myself.$7
Are you trying to annoy me?$5
Sometimes this land-locked life... it feels like a cage.$7
Hmph.$8
The pressure is building.$8#$b#...Not in the atmosphere. In me.$5
I miss the silence of the abyss.$7
Today is not a good day.$8
Just... go.$8
Kraken_StringData.Data_ExtraDialogue.Sum: I've fought wars and sunk fleets... I've lived for years in the cold, lonely dark.$7#$b#I thought I knew what strength was.$6#$b#But you... you showed me a different kind of strength. Kindness. Trust. Love.$4#$b#Looking out at the world from up here, with you... it's the greatest victory I've ever known.$9
Kraken_StringData.Strings_StringsFromMap: Colorful shells are pushing the clasp to its limits.
The lush plant lets out a tropical aroma.
Faint traces of smoke linger amist the coals.

Kraken_StringData.Strings_StringsFromCSF: I can't believe I'm married to a human farmer.$4#$b#My life has taken the strangest turn... and I've never been happier.$9#$b#I will protect this home, and I will protect you, @. Always.$4
To think... I once despised all of humanity, and now... now I long to marry one.$4#$b#Yes from the deepest depths of my soul!$9#$b#I'll get everything ready over the next 3 days.$4
Kraken_StringData.Strings_MovieReactions: So you've had your eye on that film too?$1#$b#Let's see if it can live up to our expectations.$4
Hah! Pathetic.$6#$b#They should be afraid of what's really in the dark.$1
That was... surprisingly entertaining.$1#$b#The depiction of that sea monster were laughably inaccurate, of course. A real sea monster is far more terrifying.$6
A educational film, hmm?$0#$b#Perhaps I'll learn something about this strange world of yours.$6
That was informative.$1#$b#I feel I understand the surface world a little better now. Thank you for bringing me.$0
You really want to see that one?$8#$b#I doubt it will compare to the plays by my own kind.$6
All this noise and flashing lights... it's giving me a headache.$8
What a waste of time.$8#$b#That was loud, pointless, and frankly, boring.$5
Kraken_StringData.Strings_AnimationDescr: Hello @, Marlon and I were just discussing the current state of affairs between the seas.$1
This blade... Even if ancient, still bears the stains of kraken blood on it.$2
How did I manage to get here?$0#$b#The ocean reaches much further than you think, even if it is not directly connected.$0
This man selling cacti...$2#$b#Are lots of humans like him?$2
The sun is absolutely brutal here. I don't know how you can stand being out of the water.$0
My tide, the water feels absolutely wonderful.$4#$b#Why don't you take a rest on the bank and dip your feet in?$4
Let me know if you want me to help you in the fishing competition.$4
Would you care to join me for a dip in the water?$1#$b#There's an underwater cave we can... visit... if you want.$1
The night market.$0#$b#It's almost as magical above the surface.$0
Do you feel the pull of the moon?$0#$b#It's pull influences us all.$0
I hear a forlorn song from within this boat.$0
The mermaid inside and I once knew each other as kids.$4#$b#It's good to see she's doing so well?$4
You take the submarine and I'll swim down. We'll see who gets to the ocean floor first.$1#$b#If you win I'll give you a little show from the window.$1
The moonlight feels divine right now my tide. I think I'll stay out late tonight.$4
Kraken_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_El: Thanks for the help tonight @. It's good to know you're keeping the town safe.$1
Thanks for the help the other night @. It's good to know you're keeping the town safe.$1
Congratulations on the wedding!$1#$b#Finding love despite all differences. The thought is filling me with inspiration as we speak!$1
Kraken_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_Jo: I hope {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Name}} enjoyed the dinner. {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Upper01}} seems so wonderful.$2
I saw {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Name}} at the beach the other day.$0#$b#{{MPP_EK_Kraken_Upper01}} and I ended up chatting so long I was late to make dinner for my family!$2
So @... When are you coming back over with {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Name}}?$0
Vincent cried for hours when we got home.$4#$b#To think someone would do such a terrible thing to a child.$4
I had a nightmare last night about when Vincent was taken.$4#$b#It scares me that it might happen again.$5
This week is a year since that man kidnapped Vincent.$4#$b#I'm so glad that awful event is behind us.$2
So you are a couple! I'm so happy to hear it!$1
Married to {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Name}}!$1#$b#You two have been the perfect couple since the beginning!
You two were so perfect at the wedding.$1
I can't believe you @!$3#$b#How could you do that to poor {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Name}}?$3#$b#Between the two of you, I can clearly see who the 'monster' is.$3
Kraken_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_Ke: Thank you for saving Vincent.$3#$b#As a father, I can't tell you how disappointed I am that I wasn't there to help.$3
I heard the man who took Vincent has been sentenced to life in prison.$3#$b#If you ask me... nevermind$3
This week is a year since that man kidnapped Vincent.$4#$b#I'm so glad that awful event is behind us.
Kraken_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_Le: Congratulations on the wedding!I hope everything is going splendidly for you two!$1
I'm sorry to hear about your {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Lower29}}.$3#$b#Just make sure it doesn't reflect too poorly on the town please.$3
Kraken_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_Ma: @, I ask that you do not mention our meeting with Gideon to anyone.$0
What happened to Lorin?$0#$b#I can't disclose that information, but trust me when I say death would have been better.$0
Kraken_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_Vi: I saw {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Name}} at the beach today.$1#$b#{{MPP_EK_Kraken_Upper01}} told me all these cool things about the ocean!$0
I always thought kidnappings only happened on TV. I didn't think they were real.$2
Do you think {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Name}} would want to come over more?$3#$b#I don't want that man to get me again.$3
{{MPP_EK_Kraken_Name}} came over to say hi!$0#$b#{{MPP_EK_Kraken_Upper01}} brought me a cake to celebrate that I've been home safe for a year.$1
How come you and {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Name}} never come over anymore?$2
Kraken_StringData.Characters_Dialogue_Wi: I'm still not sure what's wrong with the traps, but I'll keep working on them.$0
I'm not sure what changed but the traps are working again!$1
