Data.Data_Mail.Arbitrary_MonstrousTownMe: Hello @.^^Mayor Lewis and I have just announced a town meeting that will occur during our next sunny day. Please meet me in the mountains at your earliest convenience on that day.^^   - Marlon[#]Monstrous Town Meeting
Data.Data_Mail.Dhampir_SpecialOrderThank: Thanks for gathering the materials! The room looks wonderful and I've already been selected as a mentor. The intern should get here on Thursday.^^   - Robin[#]Internship Prep
Data.Data_Mail.Djinn_SpecialOrderThanks: We did it! The Oasis was ranked #1 for most beautiful tourist stop in all of Calico. Come celebrate with me this weekend!.^^   - Sandy[#]Regional Inspections
Data.Data_Mail.Kraken_SpecialOrderThanks: Hello @,^^Thank you so much for the help with the party! Poor Jas got scared when Vincent told her about a 'Storm Monster' he saw at the beach last night, but^the ice cream you brought helped calm her down. After that everyone had a great time!^^   - Jodi[#]Vincent's Party
Data.Data_SpecialOrders.Dhampir.Name: Internship Prep
Data.Data_SpecialOrders.Dhampir.Objectiv: Drop wood off in Robin's store.
Drop stone off in Robin's store.
Drop iron bars off in Robin's store.
Drop pine tar off in Robin's store.
Data.Data_SpecialOrders.Dhampir.Text: I've applied to be part of the Carpenter's internship program but need to make space for a guest to stay with me during their time here in the valley. Can you bring me materials so I can refurbish our attic?        -Robin
Data.Data_SpecialOrders.Djinn.Name: Regional Inspections
Drop crystal floor off in Sandy's store.
Data.Data_SpecialOrders.Djinn.Text: Regional inspections are starting up soon. I want to make sure my store is at the top of the charts. Can you help me bring supplies to help spruce up this place?        -Sandy
Data.Data_SpecialOrders.Kraken.Name: Vincent's Party
Data.Data_SpecialOrders.Kraken.Objective: Place ice cream in Jodi's kitchen.
Data.Data_SpecialOrders.Kraken.Text: Vincent wants to have a party. Would anyone mind helping us get everything we need?
Data_Events.2523800001.001: Before we begin, I must ask you what you know about the relationship between monsters and humans?
Data_Events.2523800001.002: I thought so.#$b#Hmm...#$b#Allow to explain a bit more to you then, starting at the beginning.#$b#Though most of the details have been lost to time, there was a war between monsters and mankind nearly a thousand years ago.#$b#With neither side capable of claiming vicory, a truce was struck by which both groups would separate themselves from each other in their entirety.#$b#To help ensure this treaty would be maintained, two secret groups known as The Council of Adventurers and the Ring of Eldritch were formed.
Data_Events.2523800001.003: Why do I bring this up?#$b#It is because The Council of Adventurers and The Ring of Eldritch have recently decided to unite the two groups once again.
Data_Events.2523800001.004: As you probably suspect there will be several who oppose this decision.#$b#Considering the relationship you have with town, I ask for your support in the upcoming town meeting.#$b#@ will you assist the citizens of Pelican Town show hospitality to the monsters who are willing to join the community?
Data_Events.2523800001.006: ...we hope you'll help us in this endeavor. You have my word that they will abide by the law we maintain and respect us as long as we respect them.
Data_Events.2523800001.008: How will I even treat one?
Data_Events.2523800001.011: Calm down everyone!#$b#As you can see, there are no monsters here yet.#$b#Even if there were, we all know Marlon.#$b#If he says it'll be okay, I expect you all to trust him.#$b#Now,
Data_Events.2523800001.012: Let's make sure to give them a full Pelican Town welcome when they get here!
Data_Events.2523800101.001: ...and that's about it.#$b#If you have any more questions, feel free to ask.
Data_Events.2523800101.002: Hello @! Your timing couldn't have been better.
Data_Events.2523800101.003: This is {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}}, {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower01}}'s the intern I was telling you about.#$b#{{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}}, this is @. They run the farm nearby.
Data_Events.2523800101.004: It's a pleasure to meet you! Robin says you're a big customer.#$b#I look forward to working with you!$9
Data_Events.2523800101.005: Since {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower01}} doesn't have {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower04}} license yet, {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}} can't help me with your larger projects so {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower01}}'ll be helping me with other tasks in town.#$b#Make sure to treat {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower03}} well!$1
Data_Events.2523800101.006: You're room is upstairs. Let me show you the way so you can get settled in so you can be ready for tomorrow.
Data_Events.2523800101.007: I'll be with you in just a moment @!
Data_Events.2523800102.002: Robin asked me to repair the fence for Lewis. What do you think?
Data_Events.2523800102.004: What's that? I'm looking a little red?
Data_Events.2523800102.005: #$b#Oh no! I totally forgot to wear my sunscreen!$3
Data_Events.2523800102.006: Thanks for saying something. I tend to burn real easily so I try to wear lots of sunscreen.
Data_Events.2523800102.007: Hey @, what do you do to keep yourself cool while you work?
Data_Events.2523800102.011: Oh you too?#$b#I'm glad I'm not the only one!$1
Data_Events.2523800102.012: I haven't heard that in years!$1#$b#What are you? A fifteen year-old?$1
Data_Events.2523800102.013: I'm not really sure what you mean by that.$2#$b#I guess I'll just ask Robin for advice.$2
Data_Events.2523800102.014: Unfortunately, I got my sensitive skin from my mom, so it's more genetics than anything.#$b#She's actually worse than I am and burns almost instantly in the sun.
Data_Events.2523800102.015: Yeah, I'll be fine. That was my last project for the moment so I'm going to head back to Robin's for lunch.#$b# I'll see you later!
Data_Events.2523800103.003: Why did I run across the river?$2#$b#I always imagine something bad happening when I cross bridges over running water.$2#$b#My dad tried to help me with it but it never fully went away.$7
Data_Events.2523800103.006: Hey! Stop that!$5#$b#I know it's childish but I can't help it.$7
Data_Events.2523800103.007: It's nice of you to say that but I know it's childish.$4#$b#Trust me, I'm much better now than I used to be.$4
Data_Events.2523800103.008: Anyway, Vincent broke one of the display cases in the library.#$b# {{MPP_EK_Penny_Name}} says it was an accident but it still needs to be fixed.
Data_Events.2523800103.009: Please don't tell Robin about this. She already worries about pushing me too hard so I don't want her to fret even more.#2
Data_Events.2523800104.002: Hi @.$2#$b#Sorry you had to see that. I didn't expect anyone to be out here.$2#$b#I guess I should have tried to get a little further away.$2
Data_Events.2523800104.003: Gus wanted too thank me for fixing a few of the tables in the bar so he invited me and Robin's family over for pizza.$2#$b#I never told him I'm allergic to garlic so I can't blame him...$2
Data_Events.2523800104.005: Garlic! Why didn't you say something?$2
Data_Events.2523800104.006: I'm sorry. I thought it would be okay if I only had a little.$2
Data_Events.2523800104.007: *sigh*$2#$b#You really need to take better care of yourself.
Data_Events.2523800104.008: @ could you tell Demetrius that I'm taking {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower03}} home?$2
Data_Events.2523800104.011: Thanks for checking on me @.$1#$b#I hope you still have a good night.$2
Data_Events.2523800105.002: Ask @. ${He^She}$ spends a lot of time with {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower03}}.$2#$b#${He^She}$ may know something.$2
Data_Events.2523800105.003: @ has {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}} seemed different to you lately?$2#$b#When {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower01}} first got here {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower01}} was full of life but these days {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower01}} barely seems to have the energy to crawl into bed at night.$2#$b#I'm worried I may be pushing {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower03}} too hard.$2
Data_Events.2523800105.004: Hi @! I didn't know you were coming!$4#$b#Did you need help with another project?$4
Data_Events.2523800105.005: No, ${he^she}$ was looking for you, I just called ${him^her}$ in here.$1#$b#I won't keep @ any longer though. We can catch up later.$1
Data_Events.2523800105.007: Robin's really worried about me right now isn't {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower01}}?$2
Data_Events.2523800105.008: Hey @? Can I ask you something?$7#$b#What would you do if you had a secret you weren't supposed to tell anyone?$7#$b#But keeping that secret meant that you had to lie to the people you care about?$7#$b#Would you still keep it? Even from your closest friends?$2
Data_Events.2523800105.009: The truth is Robin is right to worry about me.$2#$b# Not because of my heath, but because of who I am.
Data_Events.2523800105.010: This is a picture of my family.$2#$b#The other day, when Marlon told the town about monsters, he was talking about people like me and my family.$2#$b#You see, my dad comes from a family of monster hunters.$2#$b#He trained his whole life to kill them but on his first mission, just as he managed to corner a vampire, he found himself unable to kill her.$2#$b#Instead, he hid her from his parents and helped her get away, telling his parents that she'd disappeared.
Data_Events.2523800105.011: A few days later, when a vampire coven surrounded his house to get their revenge, she stepped in and protected him in return.$1#$b#The vampires tried to get her out of the way but her love for my dad convinced them to leave in peace.$9#$b#My grandparents were furious though, demanding that he slay the vampire and trying to kill him as well when he refused.$7
Data_Events.2523800105.012: In the end they fled my grandparents' house and found a peaceful life of their own in the countryside.$1#$b#Eventually, I was born.$1
Data_Events.2523800105.013: My parents did their best to raise me normally, but being half human and half vampire has lots of drawbacks.#$b#Do I sleep during the day or at night? What did I need to eat?#$b$ Would I be able to live a normal life in either world?
Data_Events.2523800105.014: In the end I have both of my parents in me, so I can do a bit of everything.#$b#I have more energy at night and the sun burns me easily, but I can eat most normal foods without too many problems.#$b#I also don't have the venom I'd need to turn humans into vampires either.$4
Data_Events.2523800105.015: So what do you think I should do?$2#$b#I want to tell Robin, but I don't know how.$2#$b#I don't want to leave but I would understand if {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower01}} doesn't want a half-vampire in her house with her and her family.$2
Data_Events.2523800105.016: Really!? You'd do that for me?$4
Data_Events.2523800105.017: Alright, I'll do it then.$4#$b#If you can help me find the right time. I'll tell them everything.$4
Data_Events.2523800106.002: I ran a few tests and it looks like {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower01}} suffered minor levels of shock as a result of acute anemia.$2#$b#Normally I would've administered a blood transfusion alongside a few other treatments, but after what you told me...$2#$b#I decided it would be best to deliver the nutrients directly to {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower04}} stomach.$2#$b#I called Robin and Demetrius and they're on their way but I think it would be best if you talked to {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower03}}.$2#$b#Judging by {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower04}} mental state, I think {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower01}}'s going to want someone {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower01}} trusts close by for the time being.$2
Data_Events.2523800106.003: ...$2#$b#...Dr. {{MPP_EK_Harvey_Name}} told me what happened.$2#$b#I'm sorry for causing you so much trouble.$2
Data_Events.2523800106.004: It's alright, I know you only told him because you were worried about me.$2
Data_Events.2523800106.005: I'm glad you were the one to find me. If you hadn't I'm not sure what I would have done.
Data_Events.2523800106.006: It sounds like Robin and Demtrius are here. Will you stay with me when I tell them?$2
Data_Events.2523800106.007: We came as fast as we could. Are you doing alright {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}}?$2
Data_Events.2523800106.008: I'm fine. Just tired.#$b#@ managed to get me here quickly and Dr. {{MPP_EK_Harvey_Name}} was able to take care of me.
Data_Events.2523800106.009: This is all my fault. I knew I was pushing you too hard.$2#$b#You were just doing so well that I let myself... I'm sorry!$2
Data_Events.2523800106.010: No, it's not your fault.$2#$b#There's something I need to tell you.$2
Data_Events.2523800106.011: I'm sorry for not telling you earlier.$2#$b#I promise I'll leave so you don't have to worry about your family being around a Dhampir anymore.$2
Data_Events.2523800106.012: Oh {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}}!$2#$b#I'm so sorry you had to go through this alone.$2#$b#If only you had told me sooner! I would have done what I could to make it easier for you.$2
Data_Events.2523800106.014: Of course not!$1#$b#It may just be a temporary internship but we consider you part of our family now!$1#$b#We would never want you to leave!$1
Data_Events.2523800106.015: From now on we'll do everything we can to make this work.$1#$b#I'll talk to Lewis about morning and evening work so you can stay out of the sun.$1#$b#I can't do anything about the bridges but we'll make sure to keep your food garlic free!$1
Data_Events.2523800107.002: When I first arrived in Pelican Town, I was terrified.#$b#Trying to hide who I am, dealing with all the responsibilities I brought with me...#$b#It felt like everyone was watching me; waiting for me to slip up.#$b#It got so overwhelming, I ended up calling my dad and telling him I wanted to come home.#$b#There was a long pause. Then he said something I'll never forget.
Data_Events.2523800107.003: He said, '{{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}}, you're a dhampir.'#$b#'You're living proof that even the most opposite people can learn to cherish each other.'#$b#'If you can find just one person to trust, others will follow.'
Data_Events.2523800107.004: He was right.$4#$b#Because of you, I found the courage to stop hiding and start opening up to people in town.$4
Data_Events.2523800107.005: I still have a long way to goand I'm still scared I might mess things up.$4#$b#But no matter what happens, I'll always be thankful for the strength you helped me find.$4
Data_Events.2523800107.006: *Starting tomorrow, Cassandra will be unlocked as a marriage candidate.*
Data_Events.2523800108.002: You came looking for me because it's getting late?$2#$b#That's so sweet of you!$4#$b#Sorry, I was dropping off some tools I borrowed from Robin. I guess I lost track of time when we started talking!$1
Data_Events.2523800108.003: It's funny.$1#$b#Even though I was only with them for a short bit, it almost feels like going home when I see them.$1
Data_Events.2523800108.004: Anyway, it's getting late.$1#$b#Shall we head home?$9
Data_Events.2523800108.007: What are we waiting for then? Let's go.
Data_Events.2523800108.008: No. Not yet.#$b#If we try anything now it will just spook {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower03}}.#$b#Let's leave for now and wait for a better opportunity.
Data_Events.2523800109.002: If you're headed to Robin's house, do you mind if I join you?$1
Data_Events.2523800109.003: It's been a while since we've been able to spend time together.$1#$b#I never imagined that work on a farm could be this busy.$1#$b#I guess that just makes moments like this so much better!$9
Data_Events.2523800109.004: What's going on here? Is the road closed?$2
Data_Events.2523800109.007: In accordance with the Laws of the Dawn, I have been ordered to bring you to the Great Cathedral.#$b#Any form of resistance will only make things harder so please come with me.
Data_Events.2523800109.009: Stand down civilian. I don't want to cause a scene.$3
Data_Events.2523800109.012: Fine.$3#$b#In accordance with the Laws of Dawn, allegiance to any known monster is an act of treason against the Divine Light.$3#$b#As such you and that monster will now be executed for the protection of the land.$3
Data_Events.2523800109.015: Galleon.#$b#Leave now or I will personally cut you down with my own blade.
Data_Events.2523800109.017: I see you know who I am.
Data_Events.2523800109.018: I will not ask again.#$b#Leave at once.
Data_Events.2523800109.021: I'm glad we made it in time @.
Data_Events.2523800109.022: I'm sorry. Your questions will have to wait.#$b#I promise you are safe now, but I must ensure that they keep their word and leave our land completely.#$b#Meet me at the guild later and I will explain everything.
Data_Events.2523800110.001: Thank you for coming @ and {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}}.#$b#I am happy to confirm that those knights that gave you trouble are no longer around.#$b#From here on out, you should be safe from them forever more.
Data_Events.2523800110.002: Now, our time is short but there are a few people that would like to meet you.
Data_Events.2523800110.003: Don't be shy now.#$b#Go ahead and meet your granddaugter.
Data_Events.2523800110.004: Oh {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}}!$1#$b#We've waited so long for this day!$1#$b#You've grown up so big and strong!$1
Data_Events.2523800110.006: Mom and dad said you never wanted to see me!$3
Data_Events.2523800110.007: Yes. That is our fault.$2#$b#When we first found out about your father and mother... Who our son had fallen in love with...$2#$b#We didn't know what to do and we lashed out.$2#$b#It was the worst mistake we ever made.$2
Data_Events.2523800110.008: No...$2#$b#Dad said you might try to hurt me if you ever showed up.$2
Data_Events.2523800110.009: Oh {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}}. We would never hurt you!$1#$b#Yes we were upset, but by the time we calmed down, your father and mother had vanished.$1#$b#We never got the chance to apologize for what we said.$1
Data_Events.2523800110.011: Of course not!$1#$b#Your father just has a dramatic flare. It's something that he got from me.$1
Data_Events.2523800110.012: Unfortunately, like Marlon said, our time is short.$1#$b#We will visit you again, but until then, know that you are our beloved {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower25}}.
Data_Events.2523800110.013: @, thank you for taking care of our {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower25}}.$1#$b#We've seen the way you care for {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower03}} from a distance and know that we can trust {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Lower03}} with you.$1#$b#Please reach out to us if you ever need anything. Marlon will know how to contact us.$1
Data_Events.2523800110.014: Marlon, thank you for everything.#$b#We're ready to go. Please watch over {{MPP_EK_Dhampir_Name}} until our mission is complete.
Data_Events.2523800110.015: I will.#$b#Good luck and may the blessings of the Adventurer's soul be upon you.
Data_Events.2523800201.001: @! I'm so glad you made it!$1
Data_Events.2523800201.002: Your timing is perfect! We were just toasting to your amazing handiwork. This new floor is wonderful!$1
Data_Events.2523800201.003: Isn't it?$1#$b# I swear, it's what put us over the top for the 'Best Tourist Stop in Calico' award!$1
Data_Events.2523800201.004: I couldn't have done it without you, @.$1#$b#To good friends and solid foundations!$1
Data_Events.2523800201.005: And to the wonderful new energy you've both brought to this place!$1#$b$The vibes are immaculate.$1
Data_Events.2523800201.008: This place! The colors! The cactus view! That GORGEOUS new floor!$10#$b#It's even better than the first time! A simple report really just can't do it justice!$1
Data_Events.2523800201.009: Oh! Hello there! Your aura is certainly... very bright...$6
Data_Events.2523800201.010: Bright ideas are my specialty! And speaking of specialties, I am here on SUPER official business!$10
Data_Events.2523800201.011: The most exciting business! The kind of business that calls for nothing less than a celebration!$1
Data_Events.2523800201.012: ...Right. Look, {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Name}}, I appreciate the enthusiasm, but I already had the inspection and the news.$0#$b#What else could you need to tell me?
Data_Events.2523800201.013: Oh, nothing much!$1#$b#It's a mega-ultra-super-duper announcement that's going to change EVERYTHING!$10
Data_Events.2523800201.014: As the top regional inspector for the Ferngill Republic Tourism Board, I get to make the big calls.$1#$b#And after your shop won 'Best Tourist Stop,' my bosses finally listened to my BIGGEST idea yet!$10
Data_Events.2523800201.015: This isn't just a store anymore, Sandy-pants!$1#$b#It's the BRAND NEW, shiny, spectacular... Joja-Free...$1#$b#Regional Management Hub!$1
Data_Events.2523800201.016: The... the what now? The regional... hub? Here?
Data_Events.2523800201.017: YEP! Which means...$1#$b#I get to work here!$1#$b#I'm your new hands-on Operations Manager! We're going to be partners!$1
Data_Events.2523800201.018: Partners? Nobody told me about a partner...
Data_Events.2523800201.021: Wait, what does a 'Regional Management Hub' even do?
Data_Events.2523800201.023: RIGHT?! See, this one gets it! A farmer with vision! I like you already!$1
Data_Events.2523800201.024: We're going to boost this place into the stratosphere! More visitors, special events, maybe even a festival! The potential is OFF THE CHARTS!$10
Data_Events.2523800201.026: EXCELLENT question! A very practical and important one!$1
Data_Events.2523800201.027: It means I'll be coordinating with other local attractions, managing regional marketing budgets, streamlining supply lines for goods, and developing new tourist outreach programs!$1#$b#All from right here, so I can stay connected to the heart of the community!$1
Data_Events.2523800201.028: Oh, that actually sounds really fun!$1
Data_Events.2523800201.029: Thank you! I've been told I'm powered by sunshine and pure ambition!$1#$b#You can't make a place the #1 tourist destination on decaf, you know!$1
Data_Events.2523800201.030: Gotta work hard to make a big splash! And believe me, we are about to cause a TIDAL WAVE of excitement in this desert!$10
Data_Events.2523800201.032: Anyway! I have to go file the final transition papers! I just couldn't wait to pop in and share the news in person!

Data_Events.2523800202.007: No, I'm not expecting you to fix this, I'm expecting you to CONNECT me to someone who can fix this!$5#$b#The contract specifically stated...$5#$b#Okay.$2#$b#Fine. Transfer me to your supervisor.$8

Data_Events.2523800203.008: Please... you can't tell anyone. Especially not Sandy.$2#$b#If she, no, anybody knew...$2#$b#they'd think everything I do is just a trick. All my work, my promotion...$2#$b#They'd think I just snapped my fingers and made it happen, it wouldn't have any value. That *I* wouldn't have any value.$2
Data_Events.2523800203.009: So please...$2#$b#Can you keep it a secret?$2
Data_Events.2523800203.011: Your secret is safe with me.
Data_Events.2523800203.013: I knew there was something more to you..
Data_Events.2523800203.014: Really? You... you promise?$1#$b#Oh, thank you, @. Thank you. You have no idea what that means to me.$1
Data_Events.2523800203.015: I'm... I'm a Djinn. And most people only see us as wish-granters and shortcuts. Not... people who actually want to earn their place.$2
Data_Events.2523800203.016: I'm a Djinn. My kind... we're made of magic and starlight and stories.$2
Data_Events.2523800203.017: But I don't want to BE a story. I want to be a person.$1#$b#I want the things I build with my own two hands to matter more than the things I can make with a wish.$1
Data_Events.2523800203.018: You did? Was I that obvious?$2#$b#And I was trying so hard...$2
Data_Events.2523800203.019: I'm a Djinn. It's been so long since people knew, that I guess I thought I was in the clear.$2
Data_Events.2523800203.020: I'm sorry I panicked. It's just... a deeply ingrained habit.$2#$b#Thank you for understanding.$0
Data_Events.2523800203.021: It feels... lighter. Having someone else know.$4
Data_Events.2523800203.022: Now, uh... you should probably go before Sandy gets back.$2#$b#The store really is supposed to be closed right now.$2#$b#She'd probably be fine if it's you but she doesn't want others coming in right now.$2#$b#Come back some other time though!$1

Data_Events.2523800204.006: I'm trying to decide if a pier would be a good investment to help increase fisherman capacity without overwhelming the shores where people could play in the water.$1
Data_Events.2523800204.007: It's all about the cost-benefit analysis, you know?$1#$b#Does the aesthetic appeal and recreational potential outweigh the construction costs and ecological footprint?$1#$b#It's a real head-scratcher!$1
Data_Events.2523800204.008: I was in my tower when I sensed it...$0#$b#a powerful, untethered magical aura in this forest.$0#$b#A presence I have not sensed before.$0
Data_Events.2523800204.010: M-me?$3#$b#I... I don't know what you're talking about, sir! I'm just a... a regional inspector!$3
Data_Events.2523800204.011: Your physical form says one thing, but your essence screams another.$0#$b#It is bright and ancient, like a trapped star. You are no mere inspector.$0
Data_Events.2523800204.012: How do you handle the Wizard?
Data_Events.2523800204.014: {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Upper04}} 'aura' is just a lot of caffeine. Right, {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Name}}?
Data_Events.2523800204.015: {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Upper01}}'s a magical being, yes. But {{MPP_EK_Djinn_Lower01}} means no harm.
Data_Events.2523800204.016: I see.$0#$b#Your judgment has proven sound in the past. If you vouch for this individual, I will take it into consideration.$0

Data_Events.2523800204.020: ...An unusual explanation.$0#$b#The energy signature is far more complex than that of a simple bean stimulant...$0#$b#Still... perhaps my senses are over-attuned today.$0

Data_Events.2523800205.008: I didn't have anything concrete yet.$2#$b#The pier project for the lake got denied, and our usual suppliers for exotic goods are having a bad season...$2#$b#So I panicked. I just started talking!$2#$b#I told them we were planning a massive blowout sale at the Oasis that would triple our quarterly profits!$2
Data_Events.2523800205.009: And they bought it! They loved it!$2#$b# They said they were looking forward to seeing the results.$2#$b#But the sale doesn't exist! I made it up on the spot!$2
Data_Events.2523800205.010: My job... my entire reputation is built on being competent. On working hard and getting results.$2#$b#If I can't pull this off... they'll know it was all just hot air.$2
Data_Events.2523800205.011: @... do you think maybe this is it..?$2
Data_Events.2523800205.012: Maybe this is the one time... I have to use it.$2#$b#I could just... *poof*... create a shipment of flawless diamonds or rainbow shells.$2
Data_Events.2523800205.013: No one would have to know where they came from... The sale would be a success...$2
Data_Events.2523800205.014: You... you really think so? Even now?$2
Data_Events.2523800205.015: It's just... sometimes it feels like my energy is all I have. When that's not enough... I don't know what to do.$2
Data_Events.2523800205.016: But... you're right!$1#$b#I may not be a perfect shop owner yet, but I still am an inspector!$1#$b#I inspect. I plan. I solve problems. That's who I am!$1
Data_Events.2523800205.017: That's it!$1#$b#No more self-pity. It's time to get to work!$1
Data_Events.2523800205.018: Thank you! I know what I need to do now!$1
Data_Events.2523800205.019: Oh! Oh my gosh! I-I'm so sorry!$3#$b#I just... the idea... it was a really good idea! I just got excited!$3#$b#I'm sorry, but I have to go! Bye!$3

Data_Events.2523800206.005: @!$1#$b#Isn't it incredible!!!$1#$b#Word got out about the sale and everyone came to support!$1#$b#Sandy said that she's never had so many people before... We did it! WE ACTUALLY DID IT!$1
Data_Events.2523800206.008: The line is going around the building!
Data_Events.2523800206.009: You did amazing! You really are magical!
Data_Events.2523800206.010: I knew you could do it!

Data_Events.2523800206.013: You... you did?$4#$b#Hearing you say that means more to me than anything my boss just said on that phone call!$1
Data_Events.2523800206.015: Ever since I was freed from my lamp, I've been trying to figure out what to do with myself.$0#$b#I tried the usual Djinn things. I built myself a palace of starlight and filled it with enchanted treasures.$0#$b#But it was all so easy... so empty.$0
Data_Events.2523800206.016: Eventually, I got frustrated.$2#$b#How come humans, who worked until they could no longer move got to be happy?$2#$b#Why did they get to find joy when I couldn't?$2
Data_Events.2523800206.018: It wasn't until I came across this valley that things finally clicked.$4#$b#I saw how happy people were when they worked together and accomplished things.$4#$b#I saw them grow old and leave their mark on the world.$4#$b#I saw them bet everything on falling into that fragile state called love.$4
Data_Events.2523800206.019: @, for centuries, people have come to Djinn to have their wishes granted.$4#$b#But you... you're the first person who ever helped grant a wish *for me*.$4
Data_Events.2523800206.020: So... when all this madness is over... maybe you could bring me a bouquet?$4#$b#I think I'm finally ready for my next big adventure.$4

Was this 'hard work'... or was it magic?$1#$b#Did you use your unique abilities to conjure goods?$0#$b#To alter the perceptions of your customers?$0#$b#To ensure a profit margin no mortal could ever hope to achieve?$0

Data_Events.2523800209.023: So you stopped yourself once!$2#$b#But who can say you can do it again?$2
Data_Events.2523800209.024: What happens next time?$s#$b#When your... *partner*... has a bad harvest?$3#$b#When they're struggling to make ends meet, and you have the power to solve all their problems with a single thought?$3
Data_Events.2523800209.026: You would corrupt their hard work!$3#$b#You would turn their honest achievements into a lie, simply because you couldn't control yourself!$3#$b#You'd make them dependent on your tricks, because that's all you really are! A shortcut!$3

Data_Events.2523800209.032: ORDER! ORDER! I will have ORDER in this courtroom!$0

'Knights of the Dawn'...$0#$b#Your clear bias, your attempts to manipulate this court, and your harassment of a tax-paying citizen have been noted.$0#$b#Effective immediately, your organization is barred from conducting any legal or commercial activities within the jurisdiction of Pelican Town or the Calico Desert!$0#$b#Now get out of my courtroom!$0

Data_Events.2523800404.002: Sorry, I didn't mean to come off sounding like that. It's just...$3#$b#Recently, I keep thinking I see someone out here at night and I've been building up the courage to check.$3#$b#It's a relief to see it's just you.$3
Data_Events.2523800404.003: Actually, what are you doing out here?$3
Data_Events.2523800404.007: I see.$0#$b#While that does sound wonderful, I believe I'll leave it to you.$0#$b#Now that I know everything is fine, I'll be able to focus on my writing.$1
Data_Events.2523800404.009: It's you @.$0#$b#You handled that man... tactfully. Thank you.$0
Data_Events.2523800404.010: Marlon is requesting patrols?$2#$b#I guess I won't worry about it then.$0#$b#Let me know if you need anything.$1
Data_Events.2523800404.011: It's you @.$0#$b#Thank you for not scaring that man, but perhaps you could have come up with a better lie?$0
Data_Events.2523800404.012: That sounds awful!$8#$b#I know I'll be safe with you patrolling, but I'm going back inside immediately.$8#$b#Don't get hurt!$8
Data_Events.2523800404.013: It's you @.$0#$b#That was quite the barbaric description you gave of me.$0
Data_Events.2523800404.014: What am I doing?$0#$b#If you must know, I've been sent to meet with the one called Marlon.$0#$b#I'm not sure what it's about, but considering he helped you get the pendant back, I couldn't deny the request.$0
Data_Events.2523800404.015: The tides are changing @. Do not get swept away when they do.$0
Data_Events.2523800405.001: Ahoy there, son.^Ahoy there, lass.$0#$b#How are you doing today?$0
Data_Events.2523800405.002: Me?$0#$b#About a month ago, I mixed up a new recipe of lobster bait.$0#$b#The smell may be as pungent as can be, but it sure brings in a good haul!$1
Data_Events.2523800405.003: Or at least it used to.$0#$b#For some reason though, the traps stopped working three days back.$0#$b#They keep popping open after the bait's gone.$0
Data_Events.2523800405.004: What's that? You think you can help?$0#$b#I appreciate it, but maybe next time.$0#$b#My fisherman's pride on the line after all!$1
Data_Events.2523800405.005: I think I'll take this one inside and see what I can't do to fix it.$0
Data_Events.2523800405.006: Oh, hello @.#$b#I heard the fisherman's door shut and figured I'd be free to come to the surface.#$b#I wasn't expecting anyone, but what a pleasant surprise that it's just you.
Data_Events.2523800405.007: The lobsters?$0#$b#Why yes, that was me.$1#$b#Once I figured out those rudimentary traps that fisherman laid, my dinner for the forseeable future became all but assured!$1
Data_Events.2523800405.009: It's his lively hood. Could you please stop?
Data_Events.2523800405.010: The sea is my domain. What belongs to it belongs to me!$6
Data_Events.2523800405.011: I see. I wasn't aware of that...$0
Data_Events.2523800405.012: Alright, I'll refrain from taking what he catches for the time being.$0#$b#However, you will be indebted to me and I will come to collect.$0
Data_Events.2523800406.003: Are your ears full of seaweed?$5#$b#I was calling for you to stop since you entered the Cindersnap Forest!$5
Data_Events.2523800406.004: What am I doing in town?$0#$b#Marlon's council has proven... useful. The currents of animosity between the eastern and western seas are finally settling.$0
Data_Events.2523800406.005: You humans keep surprising me. It's rather... inconvenient.$0
Data_Events.2523800406.006: Hello @, what are you up to?$0
Data_Events.2523800406.007: Oh my goodness!$4#$b#What? No. Who are you?$4
Data_Events.2523800406.008: Hmph!$0#$b#Don't worry, I can tell when I'm not wanted.$0#$b#@, it was good to see you, but I'll be on my way now.$0#$b#Goodbye.$0
Data_Events.2523800406.010: I'm sorry, I didn't mean to intrude.$4#$b#It's just that I've never seen anyone... quite like you before.$0
Data_Events.2523800406.011: I see.$0#$b#You have good instincts at least.$0#$b#My kind doesn't take too kindly to curiosity.$0
Data_Events.2523800406.012: That's a shame.$0#$b#You have such a graceful presence.#0#$b#The way the light catches your hair is beautiful.
Data_Events.2523800406.014: No!$5#$b#You mistake me for a creature meant for display.$8
Data_Events.2523800406.015: No, not at all.$1#$b# I just meant that it's nice to see something so alive, so full of strength. You're breathtaking.$0
Data_Events.2523800406.016: You're bold, for a land-dweller.$0#$b#@ could learn a thing or two from you.$0#$b#You may call me {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Name}}.$1
Data_Events.2523800406.017: I'm Jodi. It's nice to meet you, {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Name}}.$1
Data_Events.2523800406.018: Your town is strange @. Though not in a bad way.$0
Data_Events.2523800406.019: I must speak with Marlon before the tides change.$0#$b#It was nice to meet you Jodi.$0
Data_Events.2523800406.020: Farewell @, I trust I'll see you again soon.
Data_Events.2523800406.021: {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Upper01}}'s something else, isn't {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Lower01}}? Strong, but lonely.
Data_Events.2523800406.022: When Marlon first made the announcement I was terrified. But now...$0
Data_Events.2523800406.023: Now I can see how remarkably human {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Lower01}} is!$1#$b#Thank you for for allowing me to meet {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Lower03}} @!$1
Data_Events.2523800407.001: Finally.$0#$b#I thought you would never come out.$0#$b#I need your help with something.
Data_Events.2523800407.002: I was visited by Jodi...$0#$b#She came to the beach this morning to find me and...
Data_Events.2523800407.003: ...she invited me to dinner with her family.$11
Data_Events.2523800407.004: This isn't funny, @. I'm trusting you to accompany me.$5#$b#You owe me.$5
Data_Events.2523800407.005: Dinner will be after 6 at Jodi's house.$0#$b#Please don't be late.$11
Data_Events.2523800408.001: You made me wait.$0#$b#It's almost time, are you ready?
Data_Events.2523800408.004: Come on in.$0#$b#Mom's just in the kitchen getting the food off the stove.$0
Data_Events.2523800408.008: Mom!$0#$b#{{MPP_EK_Kraken_Upper01}}'s the one I told you about. The monster I saw at the beach!
Data_Events.2523800408.011: Wow! You're so cool!$0#$b#Nobody believed me when I told them I saw you!$0#$b#My name's Vincent! It's good to meet you!$1
Data_Events.2523800408.012: Vincent, that's enough!$3#$b#Go wash up and get ready for dinner.$3
Data_Events.2523800408.016: I'm so sorry about that {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Name}}!$4#$b#I tried to tell him to be courteous, but sometimes he just gets excited.$4
Data_Events.2523800408.017: No. It's alright.$2#$b#It's just that most humans are frightened when they see me.$2#$b#It... it was actually kind of nice.$4
Data_Events.2523800408.019: Sounds like @'s hungry.$1#$b#Please come in! Dinner is ready!$1
Data_Events.2523800408.020: It looks like your bowl is empty. Do you need any more Lobster Bisque {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Name}}?$0
Data_Events.2523800408.021: No thank you. It was delicious, but I don't think I could eat another bite.$1
Data_Events.2523800408.022: I'm so glad to hear that.$1#$b#@ would you mind helping with the dishes?$0
Data_Events.2523800408.023: Let me help. It'll be easier for me to get to the sink.$1
Data_Events.2523800408.025: Honestly {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Name}}. You are so sweet.$1#$b#@ is lucky to be with a {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Lower09}} like you. You make the cutest couple.$1
Data_Events.2523800408.028: Don't worry about it at all!$1#$b#We have plenty of extras!$0
Data_Events.2523800408.029: ...if you insist.$2#$b#But @ and I- we're not... a couple.$11
Data_Events.2523800408.030: Oh, maybe not yet.$1#$b#Give it time. Feelings have a funny way of sneaking up on you.$1
Data_Events.2523800408.031: Y-yes, well... I should probably... help with the dishes home now.$11#$b#I mean head home now!$3
Data_Events.2523800408.036: But you do have to promise to come back sometime.$0#$b#Don't keep us waiting too long.$0
Data_Events.2523800408.038: Thank you for accompanying me tonight @.$2#$b#I'm sorry if things ended up awkward at the end. It was never my intention to force such a situation on you.$2
Data_Events.2523800408.039: If it's alright though, I need some time to myself.$2
Data_Events.2523800408.040: For what it's worth, I want you to know that I enjoyed the evening.$11#$b#Have a good night @.$11
Data_Events.2523800409.001: Hello @. I was hoping you'd come tonight.$2
Data_Events.2523800409.002: If you don't mind, there's something I want to tell you, but this isn't the right place.$11
Data_Events.2523800409.003: Would you please... come with me?$11
Data_Events.2523800409.004: @, from the day we first met, I felt there was something different about you.$11#$b#At first I thought it was a begrudging feeling of gratitude for helping me, but as time went on, it never went away.$11
Data_Events.2523800409.005: Each time I saw you, it grew stronger.$11#$b#A fleeting smile when I saw you on the shore. A warmth in my chest at the thought of your kindness.$11#$b#It was something I'd never felt before, and I didn't know what to do.$11
Data_Events.2523800409.006: It wasn't until Jodi called us a couple that I finally realized...$11#$b#That somehow, against my own will, I had fallen for you.$11#$b#Not just a little, but completely and utterly  like a pit deeper than anything you can encounter in the dark abyss.$11
Data_Events.2523800409.007: It was terrifying at first.$11#$b#How could one as kind as you love someone who carries a legacy of darkness and fury in their veins?$3
Data_Events.2523800409.008: I tried to ignore it, justifying my fears with thoughts that surely your heart yearned for someone else, but it wasn't enough.$11#$b#My mind was wrapped in thoughts of you and the burning desire to tell you the truth, no matter the consequences.$11
Data_Events.2523800409.009: @, I will not chain you to something you fear...$4#$b#But I need you to know that I love you.$4#$b#I love you, and I want to spend my life with you.$4#$b#No matter what you choose, my heart will always and forever belong to you.$4
Data_Events.2523800409.010: *Starting tomorrow, {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Name}} will be unlocked as a marriage candidate.*
Data_Events.2523800410.001: Hello @ and {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Name}}!$1#$b#What can I get for you?$1
Data_Events.2523800410.003: I'll be with them, so come find me when you're done.$1
Data_Events.2523800410.004: That's quite the {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Lower29}} you ended up with @!$0#$b#Who would've thought that there'd be people like {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Lower03}} out and about.$0#$b#Just goes to show how great the world can be if you keep an open mind.$1
Data_Events.2523800410.005: 'How great the world can be?'$3#$b#You people disgust me.$3
Data_Events.2523800410.007: You're the worst kind of swill.$3#$b#First you protect that monstrosity, and then you marry it?$3#$b#It makes me sick.$3
Data_Events.2523800410.008: Hey there!$3#$b#I won't have that kind of language in my saloon!$3#$b#Either cut it out or get out!$3
Data_Events.2523800410.009: As if I'd want to stay in a place that reeks of monster filth.$3
Data_Events.2523800410.010: Keep the change. I don't want to touch the coins of someone who serves animals.$3
Data_Events.2523800410.011: Sorry about that, @.$0#$b#I'm not sure who he was, but I'll make sure he doesn't come back.$0
Data_Events.2523800410.012: I meant what I said though.$0#$b#You married a good one.$0
Data_Events.2523800410.013: Here. Take two on the house.$1#$b#Now go over there and have a good time tonight.$1
Data_Events.2523800411.003: It's Vincent!$5#$b#A man in a black cloak took him while we were at the beach!$5#$b#He said that if I didn't go get you, he'd hurt Vincent!$5
Data_Events.2523800411.005: I don't know.$5#$b#After he took Vincent he climbed in a boat and rowed out to sea!$5#$b#Please, you have to help Vincent!$5
Data_Events.2523800411.006: @ and I will chase after him.$3#$b#Go find Marlon and tell him to meet us at sea. He'll know what to do.$3
Data_Events.2523800411.009: We'll find him and bring him back safe. I promise!$4
Data_Events.2523800411.012: *sniff*$2#$b#{{MPP_EK_Kraken_Name}}. I'm scared.$2#$b#He won't let me go home.$2
Data_Events.2523800411.013: Why you...$5#$b#What do you want with him!$5
Data_Events.2523800411.014: The boy?$1#$b#Nothing. He was just the bait to draw you out.$1#$b#What I want... is my pendant.$3
Data_Events.2523800411.015: You're disgusting.$5#$b#Threatening the life of a child for a trinket.$5
Data_Events.2523800411.016: A trinket?$3#$b#Don't insult us both.$3#$b#You know its power as well as I do.$3#$b#With it, one can command the sea itself. The tides become theirs to control.$3
Data_Events.2523800411.017: Stop right there!$2#$b#One more step and I'll kill him!$2
Data_Events.2523800411.019: That power no longer exists.$5#$b#The pendant was shattered centuries ago.$5#$b#It can't function without-$5
Data_Events.2523800411.021: The problems in the Eastern Sea were your doing!?$5
Data_Events.2523800411.022: The Scylla there was... less cooperative.$1#$b#But she learned quickly what happens to those who don't take me seriously.$1
Data_Events.2523800411.024: Collateral damage.$1#$b#Nobody will notice the extra tears in the sea.$1
Data_Events.2523800411.026: Give me the pendant or the boy dies screaming.$3
Data_Events.2523800411.028: There. The pendant is yours.$5#$b#Now let Vincent go.$5
Data_Events.2523800411.029: Oh, I will.$0#$b#He's served his purpose.$0
Data_Events.2523800411.035: Tell me.$5#$b#When you took the pendant... what did you think would happen?$5
Data_Events.2523800411.037: Fine then you will learn like the Scylla did!$3
Data_Events.2523800411.039: Did you really think I'd let you walk out of here alive!?$10
Data_Events.2523800411.040: My pendant!$2#$b#It's power belongs to me!$2#$b#To the Knights!$2
Data_Events.2523800411.048: True, this has gone well beyond what I can placate.$0#$b#But before you go too far, there's someone who needs to talk to you.$0
Data_Events.2523800411.049: {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Name}}.$1#$b#You can stop now.$1#$b#Everything is going to be alright.$1
Data_Events.2523800411.053: No you dont!$0#$b#You are in serious trouble Lorin.$0
Data_Events.2523800411.055: It's alright {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Name}}.$0#$b#You saved Vincent. I can never thank you enough!$1
Data_Events.2523800411.056: But I'm the reason he was even in danger.$2#$b#If I wasn't-$2
Data_Events.2523800411.057: Don't you dare!$3#$b#The only reason he's alive is because of you!$3
Data_Events.2523800411.059: They're right {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Name}}.$0#$b#You were a hero today.$0#$b#I'm so proud to be your cousin.$1
Data_Events.2523800411.061: I think it's time we head home.$0#$b#Thank you again {{MPP_EK_Kraken_Name}} and @.
Data_Events.2523800411.062: I should also get going.$0#$b#I need to get this half of the pendant back home.$0#$b#Come visit me soon.$0#$b#And make sure to bring @!$1
Data_Events.2523800411.064: It's strange... for the first time in years, the ocean feels calm. Like it's breathing again.$0
Data_Events.2523800411.065: For so long I thought my strength only brought pain.$0#$b#But today... it protected someone.$0
